original: praśnayogādhikāro nāma prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ oṃ namo mahābhairavāya digdevatādibhyo gurubhyaḥ ||
analyzed: praśnayogādhikāraḥ nāma prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ om namaḥ mahābhairavāya digdevatā ādibhyaḥ gurubhyaḥ
jyotiṣka śikhare ramye nānā dhātu vicitrite nānā druma latā ākīrṇe nānā ṛṣi samākule

original: siddhavidyādharākīrṇe gaṇapramathasevite | brahmaviṣṇusurādhyakṣāḥ sarve tatra samāgatāḥ || 2 ||
analyzed: siddha vidyādhara ākīrṇe gaṇa pramatha sevite brahma viṣṇu sura adhyakṣāḥ sarve tatra samāgatāḥ

original: muditaṃ bhairavaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyabhāṣanta cāmbikām | tvaṃ mātā jagatasyāsya tvameva śaraṇaṃ tu me || 3 ||
analyzed: muditam bhairavam dṛṣṭvā pratyabhāṣanta ca ambikām tvam mātā jagatasya asya tvam eva śaraṇam tu me

original: saṃsārabhayabhītānāṃ tārakā tvaṃ mahāyaśe| ṛṣayo devagandharvā gaṇavidyādharādayaḥ ||4||
analyzed: saṃsāra bhaya bhītānām tārakā tvam mahā yaśe ṛṣayaḥ deva gandharvāḥ gaṇa vidyādhara ādayaḥ

original: trastāḥ saṃsāracakre 'smiñjarāmaraṇabhīravaḥ | duḥkhitāḥ prāṇino 'nye 'pi tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: trastāḥ saṃsāra cakre smin jarā maraṇa bhīravaḥ duḥkhitāḥ prāṇinaḥ nye tvām eva śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: pṛccha tvaṃ devadeveśaṃ śaṃkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram | sadbhāvaṃ jñānasarvasvaṃ bhuktimuktiphalārpaṇam || 6||
analyzed: pṛccha tvam devadeveśam śaṃkaram loka śaṃkaram sadbhāvam jñāna sarvasvam bhukti mukti phala arpaṇam

original: yena jñātena mucyante siddhyante tuṣṭitena ca | teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā devī vacanamabravīt || 7||
analyzed: yena jñātena mucyante siddhi ante tuṣṭitena ca teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā devī vacanam abravīt

original: stutvā devaṃ maheśānaṃ stutibhirvasturūpakaṃ | yā sṛṣṭerjananī vāmā jyeṣṭhā śaktistathāmbikā ||8||
analyzed: stutvā devam maheśānam stutibhiḥ vastu rūpakam yā sṛṣṭeḥ jananī vāmā jyeṣṭhā śaktiḥ tathā ambikā

original: raudrī śaktirjagaddhātrī tāsāṃ kāryaṃ ca yādṛśaṃ | tattvarūpā-tu-yā stutyā stuteti parameśvarī || 9||
analyzed: raudrī śaktiḥ jagaddhātrī tāsām kāryam ca yādṛśam tattva rūpā tu yā stutyā stutā iti parameśvarī

original: vāmājyeṣṭhāvikāraṃ prathitaguṇamayaṃ kāryamaiśvaryavīryaṃ yasya sthāṇusthaviṣṭhaṃ viracitasakalaṃ tattvasargādisaṃgham | taṃ devaṃ niṣkalāṃśaṃ hatasakalaguṇaṃ sarvalokeśanāthaṃ śrīkaṇṭhaṃ sarvabhāvādaguṇamatamasaṃ nīrajaskamasattvam || 10||
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā vikāram prathita guṇa mayam kāryam aiśvarya vīryam yasya sthāṇu sthaviṣṭham viracita sakalam tattva sarga ādi saṃgham tam devam niṣkala aṃśam hata sakala guṇam sarva

original: śrutā deva mayā tantrā rahasyā gūḍhagocarāḥ | vāmadakṣiṇamārgāśca yāmalāstu anekadhā || 11||
analyzed: śrutāḥ deva mayā tantrāḥ rahasyāḥ gūḍha gocarāḥ vāma dakṣiṇa mārgāḥ ca yāmalāḥ tu anekadhā

original: siddhāntāśca sureśāna daśāṣṭādaśabhedataḥ | lakṣakoṭivibhāgena koṭayastu anekadhā || 12||
analyzed: siddhāntāḥ ca sureśāna daśa aṣṭādaśa bhedataḥ lakṣa koṭi vibhāgena koṭayaḥ tu anekadhā

original: siddhayogeśvarītantre śatakoṭipravistare | mūlatantre mahāsūtre sūtradvayaṃ vinirgatam || 13 ||
analyzed: siddha yogeśvarī tantre śata koṭi pravistare mūla tantre mahā sūtre sūtra dvayam vinirgatam

original: tatraikaṃ tu mayā jñātaṃ yonyārṇavasamudbhavam | na śrutaṃ śrotumicchāmi tantrasadbhāvamuttamam || 14||
analyzed: tatra ekam tu mayā jñātam yoni ārṇava samudbhavam na śrutam śrotum icchāmi tantra sadbhāvam uttamam

original: tatra caryā kriyā jñānaṃ yogaścāpi anekadhā | sabījā dhāraṇānyāstu nirbījāstu pṛthakprabho || 15||
analyzed: tatra caryā kriyā jñānam yogaḥ ca api anekadhā sa bījā dhāraṇā anyā tu nirbījā astu pṛthak prabho

original: anekopāyasaṃyogādyajanaṃ cātmanaṃ prati | nādasthaṃ bindusaṃsthaṃ ca cārasthaṃ cādhvaṣaṭkagam || 16 ||
analyzed: aneka upāya saṃyoga ādi ajanam ca ātmanam prati nāda stham bindu saṃstham ca cāra stham ca adhva ṣaṭka gam

original: śaktyuccāragataṃ deva kāraṇatyāga kālagam | śūnyabhāvagataṃ cānyaṃ śaktisthaṃ hṛdisaṃsthitam || 17||
analyzed: śakti uccāra gatam deva kāraṇa tyāga kāla gam śūnya bhāva gatam ca anyam śakti stham hṛdisaṃsthitam

original: dvādaśāntasthitaṃ caiva adhvasthamadhvavarjitam | visargasthaṃ dhruvo 'ntasthaṃ brahmanāḍyāṃ vyavasthitaṃ || 18||
analyzed: dvādaśānta sthitam ca eva adhva stham adhva varjitam visarga stham brahmanāḍyām vyavasthitam

original: turyātītaṃ paraṃ devaṃ brahmadvārāntaraṃ punaḥ | udbhavasthaṃ tathā yogaṃ viśleṣasthaṃ ca śūline || 19||
analyzed: turyātītam param devam brahmadvāra antaram punar udbhava stham tathā yogam viśleṣa stham ca śūline

original: layasthaṃ ca layātītametadicchāmi veditum | punareva tu te sarve ekabhāvagatāḥ prabho || 20||
analyzed: laya stham ca laya atītam etat icchāmi veditum punar eva tu te sarve eka bhāva gatāḥ prabho

original: lolībhūtā yathā santi tathā tvaṃ kathayasva mām | mantrāṇāṃ ca sureśāna yadvīryaṃ siddhikāraṇam || 21 ||
analyzed: lolībhūtāḥ yathā santi tathā tvam kathayasva mām mantrāṇām ca sureśāna yat vīryam siddhi kāraṇam

original: tatkimarthaṃ punardeva gopitaṃ surasattama | ye tvayā kathitā mantrāḥ pūrvaṃ syuḥ kāmasiddhidāḥ || 22||
analyzed: tat kimartham punar deva gopitam sura sattama ye tvayā kathitāḥ mantrāḥ pūrvam syuḥ kāma siddhi dāḥ

original: saptakoṭiprasaṃkhyātāḥ paśūnāṃ tu grahaṃ prati | kimarthaṃ te na sidhyanti kalpokte 'pi kṛte sati || 23 ||
analyzed: sapta koṭi prasaṃkhyātāḥ paśūnām tu graham prati kimartham te na sidhyanti kalpa ukte kṛte sati

original: kliśyanti manujātyantaṃ muktihetorjagatpate | kathaṃ mokṣo 'tra siddhiśva mantrahīnāṃ sureśvara || 24||
analyzed: kliśyanti manuja atyantam mukti hetoḥ jagatpate katham mantra hīnām sureśvara

original: mantrāṇāṃ jananī yā ca vāmākhyā śaktiravyayā | tayā guptāstu deveśa varṇāḥ kaivalyatāṃ yayuḥ || 25||
analyzed: mantrāṇām jananī yā ca vāma ākhyā śaktiḥ avyayā tayā guptāḥ tu deveśa varṇāḥ kaivalya tām yayuḥ

original: kathaṃ sā jñāyate sūkṣmā tejorūpā parā kalā | yathāgnerdāhikā śaktirbhāntyevaṃ hi gabhastayaḥ || 26||
analyzed: katham sā jñāyate sūkṣmā tejaḥ rūpā parā kalā yathā agneḥ dāhikā śaktiḥ bhānti evam hi gabhastayaḥ
tadvat eva śivasya api dharma tvena upacaryate avinābhāva yogena sarvatra eva upacaryate

original: na śivādrahitā śaktirna śaktirahitaḥ śivaḥ | viyogo naiva dṛśyeta pavanāmbarayoriva || 28||
analyzed: na śivāt rahitā śaktiḥ na śakti rahitaḥ śivaḥ viyogaḥ nā eva dṛśyeta pavana ambarayoḥ iva

original: śaktyā karaṇarūpāyā śivakṛtyaṃ pravartate | nānyo 'tra karaṇaṃ tasya yena kṛtyaṃ prakurvati || 29 ||
analyzed: śaktyā karaṇa rūpāyā śiva kṛtyam pravartate na anyaḥ tra karaṇam tasya yena kṛtyam prakurvati

original: mantraḥ śivaḥ samuddiṣṭo varṇāstasyaiva vācakāḥ | vācyavācakasaṃyogācchivastena prapaṭhyate || 30 ||
analyzed: mantraḥ śivaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ varṇāḥ tasya eva vācakāḥ vācya vācaka saṃyogāt śivaḥ tena prapaṭhyate

original: tatra deva kutaḥ śaktirgatā tyaktvā maheśvaram | yena te niṣphalā jātā mantrāścāmitatejasaḥ || 31 ||
analyzed: tatra deva kutas śaktiḥ gatā tyaktvā maheśvaram yena te niṣphalāḥ jātāḥ mantrāḥ ca amita tejasaḥ

original: mātṛkā tu kathaṃ jātā mantrāṇāṃ mātarī tu yā | viśvasya jananī yā ca mantrarūpā kathaṃ tu sā || 32||
analyzed: mātṛkā tu katham jātā mantrāṇām mātarī tu yā viśvasya jananī yā ca mantra rūpā katham tu sā

original: khecarīṇāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ yā yoniḥ kathayasva tām | śrībhairava uvāca ||
analyzed: khecarīṇām ca sarvāsām yā yoniḥ kathayasva tām śrī bhairavaḥ uvāca

original: sādhu sādhu mahābhāge yattvayā pṛcchito hyaham || 33 ||
analyzed: sādhu sādhu mahābhāge yat tvayā pṛcchitaḥ hi aham

original: tatsarvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāyatalocane | ye mayā kathitāstantrā vāmadakṣiṇayāmalāḥ || 34||
analyzed: tat sarvam kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva āyata locane ye mayā kathitāḥ tantrāḥ vāma dakṣiṇa yāmalāḥ

original: rudrabhedāstathā devi śivabhedāstathaiva ca | tatra caryā kriyā yogo jñānaṃ ca suranāyike || 35||
analyzed: rudra bhedāḥ tathā devi śiva bhedāḥ tathā eva ca tatra caryā kriyā yogaḥ jñānam ca sura nāyike

original: tatra te bhrāmitāssarve ye yasminyatra pṛcchakāḥ | na teṣāṃ kathitaṃ jñānaṃ cittavṛtti-r-apekṣayā || 36||
analyzed: tatra te bhrāmitāḥ sarve ye yasmin yatra pṛcchakāḥ na teṣām kathitam jñānam citta vṛttiḥ apekṣayā

original: yena yenārthino devi tattathā kathitaṃ mayā | mudrāmaṇḍalamantraiśca kaṣṭayogaistathāparaiḥ || 37||
analyzed: yena yena arthinaḥ devi tat tathā kathitam mayā mudrā maṇḍala mantraiḥ ca kaṣṭa yogaiḥ tathā aparaiḥ

original: recakaiḥ pūrakairdhyānaiḥ sopāyairbahubhiḥ priye | bhrāmitāḥ karmavistārairna jñānaṃ kathitaṃ mayā || 38||
analyzed: recakaiḥ pūrakaiḥ dhyānaiḥ sa upāyaiḥ bahubhiḥ priye bhrāmitāḥ karma vistāraiḥ na jñānam kathitam mayā

original: taistu jñānāvalepena tacca pṛṣṭamavajñayā | brahmā viṣṇustathā rudra indraścandraḥ prajāpatiḥ || 39||
analyzed: taiḥ tu jñāna avalepena tat ca pṛṣṭam avajñayā brahmā viṣṇuḥ tathā rudraḥ indraḥ candraḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: skandanandigaṇāḥ sarve śukrādyā ye ca yoginaḥ | kṛtakṛtyāstu te sarve ye na yaccāvadhāritam || 40 ||
analyzed: skanda nandi gaṇāḥ sarve śukra ādyāḥ ye ca yoginaḥ kṛtakṛtyāḥ tu te sarve ye na yat ca avadhāritam

original: tattathaiva varārohe 'gṛhītaṃ mandabuddhibhiḥ | sarvopāyakaraṃ jñānaṃ sadyaḥpratyayasaṃyutam || 41 ||
analyzed: tat tathā eva varārohe gṛhītam manda buddhibhiḥ sarva upāya karam jñānam sadyas pratyaya saṃyutam

original: yoginīhṛdayānandaṃ pāraṃparyakramāgatam | kathayāmi samāsena tvatprītyā suranāyike || 42||
analyzed: yoginī hṛdaya ānandam pāraṃparya krama āgatam kathayāmi samāsena tvad prītyā sura nāyike

original: mukhyā nāḍyastrayo jantoḥ suṣumṇā piṅgalā iḍā | adhordhvagāstatāstāstu jīvayuktasamīraṇāḥ ||43||
analyzed: mukhyāḥ nāḍyaḥ trayaḥ jantoḥ suṣumṇā piṅgalā iḍā adhordhva gāḥ tatāḥ tāḥ tu jīva yukta samīraṇāḥ

original: nābhyādhastādbhavedganthiḥ kukkuṭāṇḍasamaprabhāḥ | tasya nālā gatordhvaṃ tu vitastiryāva saṃmitā || 44||
analyzed: nābhya adhastāt bhavet ganthiḥ kukkuṭa aṇḍa sama prabhāḥ tasya nālāḥ gata ūrdhvam tu vitastiḥ yāva saṃmitā
tasya upari bhavet padmam aṣṭa patram sita aruṇam

original: caturaṅgulavistīrṇa keśaraiḥ ṣoḍaśāvṛtam | ekāṅgulaparīṇāhā karṇikā tadvadeva hi||46||
analyzed: catur aṅgula vistīrṇa keśaraiḥ ṣoḍaśa āvṛtam eka aṅgula parīṇāhā karṇikā tadvat eva hi

original: adhastāccaturasreṇa pṛthutvena ca sā bhavet| mallakākārarūpeṇa meruvacca prakīrttitā ||47||
analyzed: adhastāt catur asreṇa pṛthu tvena ca sā bhavet mallaka ākāra rūpeṇa meru vat ca prakīrttitā

original: tasyā madhye sthito jīvaḥ śivavacca vasetsukham | bālāgraśatabhāgaṃ tu aṇurūpo 'tinirmalaḥ || 48||
analyzed: tasyāḥ madhye sthitaḥ jīvaḥ śiva vat ca vaset sukham bālāgra śata bhāgam tu

original: vidyudvadbhāti tejena bhramate sūryabimbavat | paramātmā sa dehastho yogibhistu-r-upāsyate || 49 ||
analyzed: vidyut vat bhāti tejena bhramate sūrya bimba vat paramātmā sa deha sthaḥ yogibhiḥ tu upāsyate

original: sa eva bindurityukto vyāpayanto vyavasthitaḥ | avyāpī paśubhāvasthaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaratyasau || 50 ||
analyzed: saḥ eva binduḥ iti uktaḥ vyāpayantaḥ vyavasthitaḥ avyāpī paśu bhāva sthaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati asau

original: anādimalamāyātmā vimuktastu sadāśivaḥ | saṃsṛjedvividhāṃ bandhāṃ bhāvābhāvātmakāṃ guṇān || 51 ||
analyzed: anādi mala māyā ātmā vimuktaḥ tu sadāśivaḥ saṃsṛjet vividhām bhāva abhāva ātmakām guṇān

original: te guṇā bandhakatvena aṇvovṛtya vyavasthitāḥ | tasmādevamabhāveṣu binduryojyo svarūpake || 52||
analyzed: te guṇāḥ bandhaka tvena vyavasthitāḥ tasmāt evam abhāveṣu binduḥ yojyaḥ svarūpake

original: bindurātmā samākhyāta ātmā binduriti smṛtaḥ| vyāpakaḥ paramo bindurlayātīte vyavasthitaḥ | || 53 ||
analyzed: binduḥ ātmā samākhyātaḥ ātmā binduḥ iti smṛtaḥ vyāpakaḥ paramaḥ binduḥ laya atīte vyavasthitaḥ

original: bindudvayaṃ tato jñātvā sa saṃsārādvimucyate | catuṣkalasamopeto hutāśakaṇikākṛtiḥ || 54||
analyzed: bindu dvayam tatas jñātvā sa saṃsārāt vimucyate catuṣkala samopetaḥ hutāśa kaṇikā ākṛtiḥ

original: tiṣṭhate bhagavānīśo hṛtpadye suranāyike | māyodaragataṃ tiṣṭhedvidyotamiva cārciṣā|| 55||
analyzed: tiṣṭhate bhagavān īśaḥ hṛd padye sura nāyike māyā udara gatam tiṣṭhet vidyotam iva ca arciṣā

original: māyā prasuptanāgābhā saṃsthitā kuṭilākṛtiḥ | kuṇḍalī tena sā proktā cidrūpā-m-ātmanasya tu|| 56 ||
analyzed: māyā prasupta nāga ābhā saṃsthitā kuṭila ākṛtiḥ kuṇḍalī tena sā proktā cit rūpā tu

original: tayā nīyatyasau jīva adhaścordhva ca bhāmini | sā tu māyā samākhyātā vāmāvartā tu kuṇḍalī || 57 ||
analyzed: tayā nīyati asau jīva ca bhāmini sā tu māyā samākhyātā vāma āvartā tu kuṇḍalī

original: jyeṣṭhā nāma dvitīyā tu ṛjurekhā tu sā smṛtā | padmatantunibhākārā sṛṣṭimārgapravartanī || 58||
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā nāma dvitīyā tu ṛjurekhā tu sā smṛtā padma tantu nibha ākārā sṛṣṭi mārga pravartanī

original: raudrī śṛṅgāṭakākārā tṛtīyā sā prakīrtitā| śaśāṅkaśakalākārā nirodhī sā caturthikā || 59||
analyzed: raudrī śṛṅgāṭaka ākārā tṛtīyā sā prakīrtitā śaśāṅka śakala ākārā nirodhī sā caturthikā

original: icchājñānakriyāvibhvī catuṣka iti paṭhyate | pañcamī śivaśaktistu yā karoti gamāgamam || 60 ||
analyzed: icchā jñāna kriyā vibhvī catuṣkaḥ iti paṭhyate pañcamī śiva śaktiḥ tu yā karoti gama āgamam

original: icchā-m-utpādayedbuddhiṃ saṃkalpaṃ yā prakurvati | sā tu tribhedato jñeyā sattvarājasatāmasā || 61 ||
analyzed: utpādayet buddhim saṃkalpam yā prakurvati sā tu tri bhedataḥ jñeyā sattva rājasa tāmasā

original: jñānaśaktistathā jñānaṃ taccaivāṣṭaprakārataḥ | dharmo jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca catuṣṭayam || 62||
analyzed: jñānaśaktiḥ tathā jñānam tat ca eva aṣṭa prakārataḥ dharmaḥ jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca catuṣṭayam

original: adharmaśca tathājñānamavairāgyamanaiśatā | jñānaṃ caivāṣṭadhā bhinnaṃ karoti vikaroti ca || 63 ||
analyzed: adharmaḥ ca tathā ajñānam avairāgyam anaiśatā jñānam ca eva aṣṭadhā bhinnam karoti vikaroti ca

original: saṃkalapaśca vikalpaśca vyavahārārthakarmaṇi | kriyā tu kurute sarvaṃ dharmādharmātmakaṃ paśoḥ || 64||
analyzed: saṃkalapaḥ ca vikalpaḥ ca vyavahāra artha karmaṇi kriyā tu kurute sarvam dharma adharma ātmakam paśoḥ

original: vibhvī tu bodhanī jñeyā cicchaktipratibodhanī | pañcamī yā smṛtā śaktistadādhāro vyavasthitaḥ || 65 ||
analyzed: vibhvī tu bodhanī jñeyā cicchakti pratibodhanī pañcamī yā smṛtā śaktiḥ tad ādhāraḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: ekā eva parā śaktiḥ kriyābhede anantadhā | dharmārthakāmamokṣaṃ ca bhuñjate tadvaśāt priye || 66 ||
analyzed: ekā eva parā śaktiḥ kriyā bhede anantadhā dharma artha kāma mokṣam ca bhuñjate tad vaśāt priye

original: etacca mānasaḥ sargaḥ sattvarājasatāmasaḥ | dharmādi sātvikaṃ sargamadharmādi ca tāmasam || 67 ||
analyzed: etat ca mānasaḥ sargaḥ sattva rājasa tāmasaḥ dharma ādi sātvikam sargam adharma ādi ca tāmasam

original: rajaḥ kṣobhakṛdubhayostenāliṅgata sūyate | śabdaḥ sparśa ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca pañcamam || 68||
analyzed: rajaḥ kṣobha kṛt ubhayoḥ tena āliṅgata sūyate śabdaḥ sparśa ca rūpam ca rasaḥ gandhaḥ ca pañcamam

original: buddhirmanastvahaṃkāraḥ puryaṣṭaka iti smṛtaḥ | prāṇo 'pāna samānaśca udāno vyānameva ca || 69 ||
analyzed: buddhiḥ manaḥ tu ahaṃkāraḥ puryaṣṭakaḥ iti smṛtaḥ prāṇa pāna samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānam eva ca

original: nāgaḥ kūrmo 'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ | prāṇādhārā smṛtā vāyvastadādhārāstu nāḍayaḥ || 70 ||
analyzed: nāgaḥ kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ prāṇādhārā smṛtā vāyvaḥ tad ādhārāḥ tu nāḍayaḥ

original: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā | gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśā tathā|| 71 ||
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yaśā tathā

original: alambuṣā kuhū nāma śāṃkhinī daśamā smṛtā | etaissaha mahābhāge hṛdvindustiṣṭhate sadā || 72 ||
analyzed: alambuṣā kuhū nāma śāṃkhinī daśamā smṛtā etaiḥ saha mahābhāge hṛd vinduḥ tiṣṭhate sadā

original: brahmādidevatā tasya akārākṣaravācakaḥ | dvidhābhūto akārastu tatra kṛtyaṃ prakurvati || 73 ||
analyzed: brahma ādi devatā tasya akāra akṣara vācakaḥ akāraḥ tu tatra kṛtyam prakurvati

original: icchā yāti layaṃ jñāne jñānaṃ ca kriyayā punaḥ | kriyā yāti layaṃ vibhyāṃ vibhvī yāti śivātmakā || 74||
analyzed: icchā yāti layam jñāne jñānam ca kriyayā punar kriyā yāti layam vibhyām vibhvī yāti śiva ātmakā

original: sve sve sthāne layaṃ yāti brahmabhāvairadhiṣṭhitā | brahmā viśvasvakāryāṇi upasaṃhṛtya gacchati || 75 ||
analyzed: sve sve sthāne layam yāti brahma bhāvaiḥ adhiṣṭhitā brahmā viśva sva kāryāṇi upasaṃhṛtya gacchati

original: ikārāntaṃ parasthānaṃ yatra viṣṇuḥ sa tiṣṭhati | tatra śabdaḥ pralīyeta svakāryamupasaṃharaḥ || 76 ||
analyzed: ikāra antam para sthānam yatra viṣṇuḥ sa tiṣṭhati tatra śabdaḥ pralīyeta sva kāryam upasaṃharaḥ

original: brahmā kaṇṭhapralīnastu pūrvādhāre vyavasthitaḥ | viṣṇostu tatparaṃ sthānaṃ tatra ikāra saṃsthitaḥ || 77||
analyzed: brahmā kaṇṭha pralīnaḥ tu pūrva ādhāre vyavasthitaḥ viṣṇoḥ tu tatparam sthānam tatra ikāra saṃsthitaḥ

original: viṣṇuryātyapi rudrāntamukāro yatra tiṣṭhati | tālvantaṃ tadvijānīyātsarvajantugamāgamam || 78 ||
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yāti api rudra antam ukāraḥ yatra tiṣṭhati tālu antam tat vijānīyāt sarva jantu gama āgamam

original: rudro 'pi ceśvare yāti makāro tatra tiṣṭhati | nirodhā sā samuddiṣṭā lambakasyordhva saṃsthitā || 79 ||
analyzed: rudraḥ ca īśvare yāti makāraḥ tatra tiṣṭhati nirodhā sā samuddiṣṭā lambakasya ūrdhva saṃsthitā

original: ūrdhvamārganirodhinyā raudrī tena prapaṭhyate | tasyordhva nādajaṃ lakṣaṃ makārastatra gacchati || 80 ||
analyzed: ūrdhva mārga nirodhinyāḥ raudrī tena prapaṭhyate tasya ūrdhva nāda jam lakṣam makāraḥ tatra gacchati

original: śivasthānaṃ tu taṃ proktaṃ yatra nādasamudbhavaḥ | lambakasyordhvataścaiva dvau bindvau yatra tau priye || 81 ||
analyzed: śiva sthānam tu tam proktam yatra nāda samudbhavaḥ lambakasya ūrdhvatas ca eva dvau bindvau yatra tau priye

original: visargāntaṃ tu tatproktaṃ dvādaśāntaṃ ca bhāmini | kalāntaṃ ca svarāntaṃ ca ṣoḍaśāntaṃ ca tatsmṛtam || 82 ||
analyzed: visarga antam tu tat proktam dvādaśāntam ca bhāmini kalā antam ca svara antam ca ṣoḍaśāntam ca tat smṛtam

original: yatra cotpadyate śabdo raudrī bhinnā yadā bhavet | nādo 'pi gacchate devi yatra kuṇḍalikā sthitā ||83||

original: nādāntaṃ tadvijānīyadvisargādūrdhvataḥ priye | tasyordhva jñānaśaktistu ūrdhvasrotā manonmanī || 84||
analyzed: nāda antam tat vijānīyat visargāt ūrdhvatas priye tasya ūrdhva jñānaśaktiḥ tu ūrdhvasrotāḥ manonmanī

original: vyāpinyāntaṃ tu deveśe tatra līnā manonmanī | sphoṭamutpadyate tatra guruvaktrādadhaḥ priye || 85||
analyzed: vyāpinyā antam tu deveśe tatra līnā manonmanī sphoṭam utpadyate tatra guru vaktrāt adhas priye

original: tasyordhva guruvaktraṃ tu brahmasthānaṃ tu tatsmṛtam | śaktisthānaṃ smṛtaṃ tacca layāntaṃ tattaducyate || 86||
analyzed: tasya ūrdhva guru vaktram tu brahma sthānam tu tat smṛtam śakti sthānam smṛtam tat ca laya antam tat tat ucyate

original: tasyānte tu layātītaṃ kathitaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ | eṣa bindostu saṃcāraḥ prabuddhānāṃ varānane || 87||
analyzed: tasya ante tu layātītam kathitam tu na saṃśayaḥ eṣa bindoḥ tu saṃcāraḥ prabuddhānām varānane

original: aprabuddhāstu ye devi nirodhinyā nirodhitāḥ | teṣāṃ tiryaggatiḥ proktā saṃsārabhavabandhanī ||88||
analyzed: aprabuddhāḥ tu ye devi nirodhinyā nirodhitāḥ teṣām tiryaggatiḥ proktā saṃsāra bhava bandhanī

original: eṣa cāra samākhyātaḥ pravṛtta iti sarvadā | grahaṇaṃ tu punarvakṣyed-yonestyāgaṃ bhaviṣyati || 89||
analyzed: eṣa cāra samākhyātaḥ pravṛttaḥ iti sarvadā grahaṇam tu punar vakṣyet yoneḥ tyāgam bhaviṣyati

original: pañcakāraṇakāṃ tyaktvā svacchandagatimāpnuyāt | eṣa bindvātmako yogo yadā tyaktuṃ samīhate || 90 ||
analyzed: pañca kāraṇakām tyaktvā svacchanda gatim āpnuyāt eṣa bindu ātmakaḥ yogaḥ yadā tyaktum samīhate

analyzed: tadā tasya bhavet devi aṇima ādi guṇa aṣṭakam brahma sthāna gataḥ tyāgaḥ yadā bhavati śobhane

original: tadā brahmau sahaikatvaṃ śabdasparśa ca gacchati | tayostu tyaktayostyaktvā padmajasya tu kāraṇam || 92 ||
analyzed: tadā brahmau saha ekatvam śabda sparśa ca gacchati tayoḥ tu tyaktayoḥ tyaktvā padmajasya tu kāraṇam

original: kāryarūpo vrajedbrahmā svakāryamupasaṃhṛtaḥ | viṣṇutattve layaṃ yāti svakāryakaraṇaiḥ saha || 93 ||
analyzed: kārya rūpaḥ vrajet brahmā sva kāryam upasaṃhṛtaḥ viṣṇutattve layam yāti sva kārya karaṇaiḥ saha

original: keśave parame tiṣṭhetso 'pi tyājyo janārdanaḥ | rasendriyagatairbhāvaistyaktaistyakto na saṃśayaḥ || 94||
analyzed: keśave parame tiṣṭhet saḥ tyājyaḥ janārdanaḥ rasa indriya gataiḥ bhāvaiḥ tyaktaiḥ tyaktaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: keśavo 'pi layaṃ rudre vyāpārastyaktacetasaḥ | adhikāranivṛtto 'sau keśavo guṇavedakaḥ || 95 ||
analyzed: keśavaḥ pi layam rudre vyāpāraḥ tyakta cetasaḥ adhikāra nivṛttaḥ sau keśavaḥ guṇa vedakaḥ

original: rudre 'ṇuḥ parame tiṣṭhedyāpāraguṇasaṃyutaḥ | rudro 'pi yāti deveśe aiśvare tejarūpiṇe || 96 ||
analyzed: rudre ṇuḥ parame tiṣṭhet yāpāra guṇa saṃyutaḥ yāti deveśe aiśvare teja rūpiṇe

original: etau tyaktvā vrajedūrdhvaṃ rudrasya guṇavṛttayaḥ | īśvaro 'pi tathā nāde śabdākhye tu sadāśive || 98||
analyzed: etau tyaktvā vrajet ūrdhvam rudrasya guṇa vṛttayaḥ tathā nāde śabda ākhye tu sadāśive

gacchate ca tathā īśaḥ sva vyāpāra su saṃhṛtaḥ
śiva vidyā guṇa ādhāraḥ yatra eva īśaḥ sadāśivaḥ
tena eva parame tiṣṭhet īśvaraḥ jñāna vedakaḥ
sva kṛtyam upasaṃhṛtya gacchate tu layam svakam

original: layātītaṃ paraṃ sthānaṃ kramāt tyaktvā tu gacchati || 101 ||
analyzed: laya atītam param sthānam kramāt tyaktvā tu gacchati

original: śive līnāstu te sarve svaśaktyā hṛtavigrahāḥ
analyzed: śive līnāḥ tu te sarve sva śaktyā hṛta vigrahāḥ

original: icchā jñānaṃ kriyā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ karaṇāni tu || 103 ||
analyzed: icchā jñānam kriyā teṣām sarveṣām karaṇāni tu

original: udbhave ca tathā śleṣe laye caiva pṛthakpṛthak|| 104||
analyzed: udbhave ca tathā śleṣe laye ca eva pṛthak pṛthak
laya atītā parāśaktiḥ yā sā vibhvī śiva ātmikā
tatra ādhārā sureśāni sañcaranti kramāt kramam
sadāśivaḥ saṃhāram kurute sva icchayā prabhuḥ
manaḥ binduḥ varārohe sau cetāḥ mahā dhvaniḥ
tena saṃhṛta mātreṇa kāṣṭha vat tiṣṭhate tanuḥ
dharma adharma ātmakaḥ bandhaḥ tadā naṣṭaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: tena naṣṭena suśroṇi gacchate paramaṃ padam
analyzed: tena naṣṭena suśroṇi gacchate paramam padam
yāvat etaiḥ mahā bandhaiḥ na mucyate varānane

original: evaṃ tyāgo mayā devi khyāpito vidyayā adhaḥ || 109 ||
analyzed: evam tyāgaḥ mayā devi khyāpitaḥ vidyayā adhas
śive gacchate devi samasta guṇa saṃyutaḥ
yatra sā kuṇḍalī śaktiḥ amanaskā manonmanī

original: adhogā rodhanī jñeyā ūrdhvagā ca prabodhanī || 111 ||

original: saṃhāro raudrarūpeṇa ekā eva tridhā priye
analyzed: saṃhāraḥ raudra rūpeṇa ekā eva tridhā priye

original: sā tu pañcavidhā proktā aṣṭadhā navadhā tathā || 114||

original: tena māyā samākhyātā jñeyarūpā tu kuṇḍalī || 116 ||

original: ye dharmāḥ kāraṇe devi taiḥ saṃyukto bhavatyasau
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ kāraṇe devi taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ bhavati asau

original: [nādastham] ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi nādasthaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva me
analyzed: nāda stham atas param pravakṣyāmi nāda stham tu śṛṇuṣva me

original: jñāna kriyā tathā cecchā brahmādīnāṃ varānane
analyzed: jñāna kriyā tathā ca icchā brahma ādīnām varānane

original: sve sve sthāneṣu yatkṛtyaṃ taṃ tu tyaktvā gatā tu sā || 125 ||

ūrṇā tantu nibhā jñeyā padma sūtra nibhā athavā

original: evaṃvidhaṃ gṛhītvā tu śeṣāṃ bandhāṃ paricchinet || 129 ||
analyzed: evaṃvidham gṛhītvā tu śeṣām bandhām paricchinet

original: visargeṇa tato hṛtsthamākṛṣya ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ

original: tadā tu kuñcitau dvau tu bhruvau caiva śubhekṣaṇe
analyzed: tadā tu kuñcitau dvau tu bhruvau ca eva śubha īkṣaṇe

analyzed: tu gacchate śīghram yatra randham tu padma jam

original: evaṃ kāraṇakaṃ tyaktvā yadā śaktisamo bhavet
analyzed: evam kāraṇakam tyaktvā yadā śaktisamaḥ bhavet

original: lambakasthaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca yadā śaktisaumaṃ/u bhavet || 139 ||

analyzed: kālena lakṣitavyam hi prāṇa antam tu dinam bhavet

original: nāsikāgre dvitīyaṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ śaktinā yutam || 145 ||
analyzed: nāsikā agre dvitīyam tu tṛtīyam śaktinā yutam

original: vidite tu pare śānte tatrastho 'pi na bādhyate || 146 ||

analyzed: śaktim prāpya budhaḥ jñeyaḥ vyāpini aṃśe

original: na kālaṃ na kalā cāraṃ na tattvaṃ na ca kāraṇāṃ |

original: taṃ viditvā vimucyeta gatvā bhūyo na jāyate |
analyzed: tam viditvā vimucyeta gatvā bhūyas na jāyate

original: ṣaḍadhvā adhvaṣaṭkaṃ yathā prāṇaṃ saṃsthitaṃ kathayāmi te || 150||

original: āpādādyāva mūrdhāntaṃ citiḥ saṃvedanaṃ hi yaḥ |
analyzed: ā pādāt yāva mūrdha antam citiḥ saṃvedanam hi yaḥ

kalā kalita santānam prāṇam yat carate sadā

original: prāṇaike saṃsthitāḥ sarvāḥ prāṇānte tu layaṃ smṛtam |

original: utpadyanti layaṃ yānti yatra śabdo layaṃ gataḥ || 157||

preraṇam tu udānena yāvat tad kha mukham gataḥ
maṅgalam kūrma saṃyuktam śara astreṇa eva śodhanam

original: śuddhyate tu na sandeho dvijamārgo varānane || 264||
analyzed: tu na sandehaḥ dvijamārgaḥ varānane

original: śuddhenaiva tu mārgeṇa grahaṇaṃ caiva lakṣayet |
analyzed: śuddhena eva tu mārgeṇa grahaṇam ca eva lakṣayet
manasā grahaṇam kāryam śakti ādhāra gatasya tu
tu bhavet tasya grahaṇasya varānane
nābhi stham kampanam jñeyam jṛmbhanam mukham ākulam
aśru pātam ca bhrū bhaṅgam citta vyākula tā tathā

original: ete tu pratyayā nābhau kaṇṭhasthasyādhunā śṛṇu || 267||
analyzed: ete tu pratyayāḥ nābhau kaṇṭha sthasya adhunā śṛṇu
kaṇṭha sthaḥ dhunate gātram nādam muñcati anekadhā
śiraḥkampa pralāpaḥ ca hūṃkāraḥ ca mahā svanaḥ
tatas ūrdhvam tu yadā atītaḥ rudra sthāne vara ambike

original: tadā tu pratyayāstasya te śṛṇuṣva samāhitā || 269 ||
analyzed: tadā tu pratyayāḥ tasya te śṛṇuṣva samāhitā
rudra sthaḥ vedate śāstrām mudrāḥ mantrāni anekadhā

original: tasyordhva tu mahādevi visargākhyaṃ padaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: tasya ūrdhva tu mahādevi visarga ākhyam padam bhavet

original: visargasthaṃ yadā devi tadā śabdaṃ śṛṇoti ca || 271 ||
analyzed: visarga stham yadā devi tadā śabdam śṛṇoti ca

original: sparśe ca śītalaṃ vetti himavacchikharā iva |
analyzed: sparśe ca śītalam vetti himavat śikharāḥ iva
śakti sthānam tatas devi sādākhyena eka tām gatam
śakti sthānam unmana tvam hi viṣayāṇām varānane
aṇima ādi guṇa avāptiḥ bhavate na saṃśayaḥ
tad layaḥ yadi tatra eva sthirībhavati śobhane

original: tadā cotpatate śīghraṃ satyameva na saṃśayaḥ || 274||
analyzed: tadā ca utpatate śīghram satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: randhrasthaṃ sarvagaṃ jñeyaṃ tadātītaṃ tu vyāpakaṃ |
analyzed: randhra stham sarvagam jñeyam tad atītam tu vyāpakam
ghaṭa madhye yathā ākāśam paricchinnam pravartate
evam śarīra vicchinnam nu bhāsate

original: ghaṭe bhinne yathā devi ekabhāvaṃ tu gacchati || 276 ||
analyzed: ghaṭe bhinne yathā devi eka bhāvam tu gacchati
bahis antarya sadbhāvaḥ ekaḥ evam prabhāsate
tadvat eva hi bhūtātmā pāśa muktam prabhāsate
yathā dīpaḥ ghaṭa sthaḥ hi eka deśa prakāśakaḥ
tathā ca ātmā tu liṅga sthaḥ mana vyāpāra peśalaḥ
śeṣa bhāvena bandhānām sarva adhva upādhi varjitaḥ

original: aviditvā parantatvaṃ śivatvaṃ kalpitaṃ tu yaiḥ || 281 ||
analyzed: a viditvā śiva tvam kalpitam tu yaiḥ

original: te cātmopāsakā śaive na te yāntu śivaṃ padam |
analyzed: śaive na te yāntu śivam padam
ātma tattva gatim yānti ātma tattva ātma rañjitāḥ
ye sa ākārāni upāsanti kalpayitvā tu devatā
tasya āspadam labhanti ete na muktāḥ paramārthataḥ
tasmāt sarvam parityajya svabhāva stham upāsayet
svabhāva stham punar vakṣyet yathā bhavati tat śṛṇu

original: na nirodho na coccāro na lakṣo na ca yojanā |
svarūpasthaṃ tato jñātvā sa mukto nātra saṃśayaḥ || 285||
analyzed: sva rūpa stham tatas jñātvā sa muktaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: taṃ tyaktvā mucyate yogī savikalpastu badhyate || 286 ||
analyzed: tam tyaktvā mucyate yogī sa vikalpaḥ tu badhyate

original: na mano nāpi mantavyo mantā ca na vibhāvyate |
analyzed: na manaḥ na api mantavyaḥ mantā ca na vibhāvyate

original: na binduṃ naiva nādaśca na cāraścādhvaṣaṭkagaḥ |
analyzed: na bindum nā eva nādaḥ ca na cāraḥ ca adhva ṣaṭka gaḥ
na śakti uccāra mārge syāt kāraṇa tyāga kāla gaḥ

original: na śūnyabhāva nābhāvaṃ na śakti śiva-m-eva ca |
analyzed: na eva ca
avidyā vāsanā hi eṣā saṃsāra bhaya bandhanī
yat nā asti tatra santoṣam prāyas kaścid kariṣyati

original: āśā eva mahābandho yayā vyāpto 'khilaṃ jagat |
analyzed: āśāḥ eva mahā bandho yayā khilam jagat

original: yāvanna tyajyate sā vai tāvacchaktirna vidyate || 291 ||

original: kāśā sā mokṣavādīnāṃ yatra sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam |
analyzed: kāśā sā mokṣa vādīnām yatra sarvam kṣayam gatam

original: na mokṣasya bhave sthānaṃ na dānaṃ na ca kalpanā |
analyzed: na mokṣasya bhave sthānam na dānam na ca kalpanā

original: sarvatra vitathā dṛṣṭi sa mokṣo mokṣavādinām || 293 ||

sa vidyām ca upajāyeta avidyām tu parityajet

original: tattvabhāva sa bhūtākhya sargo yatra pravartate |
analyzed: tattva bhāva sa bhūta ākhya sargaḥ yatra pravartate

original: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ na bibheti kadācanaḥ || 296 ||
analyzed: ānandam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam na bibheti

original: sarvaṃ khalvātmakaṃ jñātvā kartavyaṃ nāsti kiñcanaḥ |

astitvam iti ced bhāvaḥ tadā bandhaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: badhnāti yatnato bhāva nānā caiva tu bhandhanaiḥ || 298 ||

original: bhāvābhāvātmakaṃ sarvaṃ manaḥ saṃkalpalakṣaṇam | śuddhāśuddheṣu bhāveṣu mano yatra pravartate || 301 ||
analyzed: bhāva abhāva ātmakam sarvam manaḥ saṃkalpa lakṣaṇam śuddha aśuddheṣu bhāveṣu manaḥ yatra pravartate

original: varṇāvarṇavikalpeṣu bhakṣābhakṣa tathaiva ca| samatvaṃ yasya jāyeta tasya jātaṃ na kiñcanaḥ || 302||

original: yathā śilāśṛtaṃ toyaṃ kṣapitaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ | na ca kenāpi tatpītaṃ na ca tatraiva tiṣṭhati || 304||
analyzed: yathā śilā śṛtam toyam kṣapitam sūrya raśmibhiḥ na ca kena api tat pītam na ca tatra eva tiṣṭhati

analyzed: nirupapattim āpannam tathā jñāna vidaḥ manaḥ yathā vāyu nabham pṛthvī balāt vahati sarvagaḥ

original: dhugdhugantaṃ mahāvīryaṃ sphuṭantaṃ taruparvatām | tatkṣaṇādyāti nirnāśaṃ tadvajjñānavido manaḥ || 306 ||
analyzed: mahā vīryam sphuṭantam taru parvatām tad kṣaṇāt yāti nirnāśam tadvat jñāna vidaḥ manaḥ

original: yathā vistarato meghā nabhamākramya saṃsthitāḥ | tatkṣaṇādyāti nirnāśaṃ vidvāṃsasya tathā manaḥ || 307||
analyzed: yathā vistarataḥ meghāḥ nabham ākramya saṃsthitāḥ tad kṣaṇāt yāti nirnāśam vidvāṃsasya tathā manaḥ

original: yathā cendhanasaṃyogādagnijvālā niropamā | tatkṣaṇātprakṣayaṃ yāti tadvacchūnyo mano viduḥ || 309||

original: atha vairāgyamāśritya kaṣṭaiścāndrāyaṇādibhiḥ | kṣapaye tantu mokṣāya saindhavaṃ conmanātmani || 311 ||

original: agnirdarbhāśca mantrāśca hotā hotavyameva ca | praṇītā viṣṭarāścaiva dīkṣādhvaraprakalpanā || 314||

original: nāstitvaṃ vartate nityamastitvaṃ tu parityajet | nāstitvaṃ tu yadā bhūto nāsti nāstīti tasya tat || 317||
analyzed: nāstitvam vartate nityam astitvam tu parityajet nāstitvam tu yadā bhūtaḥ na asti na asti iti tasya tat

analyzed: vāyunā vyākulībhūtaḥ avidyā ca upatiṣṭhati prāṇa yāma ādibhiḥ śleṣaiḥ manaḥ dhīraiḥ su nirjitaḥ

original: anyakāle prakurvīta niṣphalaṃ yatpurājitam | tasmādevaṃ tu vijñāya indriyārthaṃ calācalam || 321 ||

analyzed: manaḥ hi cañcalaḥ nityam nirāśrayam atīndriyam sa katham śakyate dhartum yasya vāyu adhikā gatiḥ

analyzed: yāvat bhāvayate ekam tāvat anyam upasthitam na dhyānam na ca vā lakṣam niṣpadyeta

original: yāvanna tyajate devi sa niruddho bhaviṣyati | icchā dveṣa sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ virāgo jñāna vā tathā || 331 ||

original: ahaṃkārāṃ parityajya mamatvaṃ tu parityajet | āśāmaśeṣatastyakttvā nirāśī saṃpraśasyate || 336||

analyzed: muktaḥ paśyati mukta ātmā ātmā sarvatra kevalam na aham asmi na ca anyaḥ sti ekatvam anupaśyataḥ

original: hiraṇyagarbha sa vijñeyo yenedaṃ vitataṃ jagat | devyuvāca ||

original: advaitaṃ na dvitīyo 'sti kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ | bhairava uvāca ||

original: niścalaṃ tasya jāyeta na cālyaṃ cālyate kvacit | calantamātmavijñānaṃ cittavṛtti-r-apekṣayā || 344||
analyzed: niścalam tasya jāyeta na cālyam cālyate kvacid calantam ātma vijñānam citta vṛttiḥ apekṣayā

original: yenedaṃ pūritaṃ sarvaṃ yogibhistadupāsyate | tapobhiḥ paṭhyate nityaṃ yatra yajñaistu ijyate || 345||

original: na sthitaṃ na mṛtaṃ tasmānna jātaṃ na tiraskṛtam || 426||

original: khakāraṃ hastamadhye tu kakāraṃ vāmataḥ priye | :kāraṃ galake yojyamaṃ dadyāttālumadhyataḥ || 161 ||
analyzed: khakāram hasta madhye tu kakāram vāmatas priye kāram galake dadyāt tālu madhyataḥ

original: au tu vinyasya jihvāgre o dadyāddantapaṅktiṣu | aikāraṃ vāmato dadyāde tu dakṣiṇanāsike || 162||
analyzed: tu vinyasya jihvā agre dadyāt dantapaṅktiṣu aikāram vāmatas dadyāt tu dakṣiṇa nāsike

original: dṛkāramakṣivāmeṣu lakāraṃ dakṣiṇe tathā | ṛkāraṃ śravaṇe vāme ṛ ca dakṣiṇage tath || 163||
analyzed: dṛkāram akṣi vāmeṣu lakāram dakṣiṇe tathā ṛkāram śravaṇe vāme ca dakṣiṇa ge

original: ūkāraṃ bhruvayordadyādukāraṃ dhruvamadhyataḥ | īkāraṃ tu lalāṭe tu ikāraṃ bindurūpiṇam || 164||
analyzed: ūkāram bhruvayoḥ dadyāt ukāram dhruva madhyataḥ īkāram tu lalāṭe tu ikāram bindu rūpiṇam

original: ākāraṃ mastake dadyādakāraṃ tattvagocare | evaṃ vinyasya cādhvānaṃ granthibhedaṃ tu kārayet || 165 ||
analyzed: ākāram mastake dadyāt akāram tattva gocare evam vinyasya ca adhvānam granthibhedam tu kārayet

original: anena kramayogena śodhyādhvānaṃ varānane | tattve tattve layaṃ bhogaṃ viyogaṃ yojanaṃ tathā || 166 ||
analyzed: anena krama yogena śodhya adhvānam varānane tattve tattve layam bhogam viyogam yojanam tathā
saṃśodhya kramaśas sarvam yojayet śāśvate pade
devī uvāca
varṇa dīkṣā śrutā deva sārāt sāratarā parā
sāṃpratam tattva dīkṣām tu śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
bhairavaḥ uvāca
tattva dīkṣāḥ mahādevi sārā yā viśvatomukhā

original: tāmahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāyatalocane | pṛthivyāpastathā tejo vāyurākāśameva ca || 169||
analyzed: tām aham saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva āyata locane pṛthivī apaḥ tathā tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca

original: etaiḥ śuddhaistu śudhyeta ṣaṭprakāro varānane | pañca karmendriyāḥ proktā buddhīndriyamataḥ param || 170 ||
analyzed: etaiḥ śuddhaiḥ tu śudhyeta ṣaṣ prakāraḥ varānane pañca karmendriyāḥ proktāḥ buddhīndriyam atas param

original: tanmātrāḥ pañca vijñeyā lakṣaṇaṃ tu ataḥ śṛṇu | śabda sparśa raso rūpaṃ gandha tanmātrapañcakam || 171 ||
analyzed: tanmātrāḥ pañca vijñeyāḥ lakṣaṇam tu atas śṛṇu śabda sparśa rasaḥ rūpam gandha tanmātra pañcakam

original: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi tu | kathitāni mayā pañca śrūyatāmeṣa niścayaḥ || 172||
analyzed: śrotram tvac cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam buddhīndriyāṇi tu kathitāni mayā pañca śrūyatām eṣa niścayaḥ

original: vācā pāṇī tathā pādau pāyūpasthaśca kīrtitaḥ | karmākṣapañcakaṃ hyetatkathitaṃ tu varānane || 173||
analyzed: vācā pāṇī tathā pādau pāyu upasthaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ karma akṣapañcakam hi etat kathitam tu varānane

original: buddhirmanastvahaṃkāraḥ prakṛtyādi yathākramam | sattvaṃ rajastamo jñeyaṃ pradhānaṃ guṇasaṃbhavam || 174||
analyzed: buddhiḥ manaḥ tu ahaṃkāraḥ prakṛti ādi yathākramam sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ jñeyam pradhānam guṇa saṃbhavam

original: avyaktaṃ tu samākhyātaṃ pañcaviṃśadudāhṛtaṃ | puruṣaṃ caiva ṣaḍviśatsukhāsukhavivedakam || 175 ||
analyzed: avyaktam tu samākhyātam pañcaviṃśat udāhṛtam puruṣam ca eva ṣaḍviśat sukha asukha vivedakam

original: kṣetrajñaṃ sukhavedajñaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā yatpurārjitam | tatkarmavāsanāśeṣaṃ bhogyaṃ tatsamudāhṛtam || 176||
analyzed: kṣetrajñam sukha veda jñam duḥkham vā yat purā arjitam tad karma vāsanā śeṣam bhogyam tat samudāhṛtam

original: tena śuddhena śudhyeta bhavabījamanekadhā | saṃśodhya kramaśo devi adhvānaṃ tu yathāvidhiḥ || 177||
analyzed: tena śuddhena śudhyeta bhava bījam anekadhā saṃśodhya kramaśas devi adhvānam tu yathā vidhiḥ

original: atorve niyatikhyātā niyamatve vyavasthitā | kāla saṃkhyāprakartāro yatkṛtaṃ tasya śobhane || 178||
analyzed: niyati khyātāḥ niyama tve vyavasthitā kāla saṃkhyā prakartāraḥ yat kṛtam tasya śobhane

original: kalayā vyāpitaṃ tatvaṃ kalitaṃ tu yataḥ sthitam | teneyantu kalā proktā rāgodvalitacetasaḥ || 179||
analyzed: kalayā vyāpitam tatvam kalitam tu yatas sthitam tena iyam tu kalā proktā rāga udvalita cetasaḥ

original: rāgācca rañjito devi māyayā balavānpriye | vidyā vedanikā jñeyā vidyā vetti śubhāśubham || 180||
analyzed: rāgāt ca rañjitaḥ devi māyayā balavān priye vidyā vedanikā jñeyā vidyā vetti śubha aśubham

original: parāvidyārthavettāraḥ śuddhamārgāśritaḥ pumān | īśvarādhiṣṭhito bhūyo gacchate śvabhrameva vā ||181||
analyzed: parāvidyā artha vettāraḥ śuddha mārga āśritaḥ pumān īśvara dhiṣṭhitaḥ bhūyas gacchate śvabhram eva vā

original: mokṣaṃ vā yadi vānyaṃ vā īśvarātsaṃpracoditaḥ | sadāśivastu vettā vai paśūnāṃ mocakaḥ priye || 182||
analyzed: mokṣam vā yadi vā anyam vā īśvarāt saṃpracoditaḥ sadāśivaḥ tu vettā vai paśūnām mocakaḥ priye

original: māyābījapariṣvaktāṃ bhogaviplutacetasām | śaktistu vyāpinī sūkṣmā śivadharmānuvartinī || 183||
analyzed: māyā bīja pariṣvaktām bhoga vipluta cetasām śaktiḥ tu vyāpinī sūkṣmā śiva dharma anuvartinī

original: śivastu sarvagaḥ proktaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśānte vyavasthitaḥ | evaṃ śodhya kramāddevi adhvānaṃ tattvasaṃkhyayā || 184||
analyzed: śivaḥ tu sarva gaḥ proktaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśa ante vyavasthitaḥ evam śodhya kramāt devi adhvānam tattva saṃkhyayā

original: ṣaṭtriṃśakapadaṃ devi śodhanīyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ | navatattvaṃ svarūpeṇa prakṛtyādi yathākramam || 185||
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśaka padam devi śodhanīyam manīṣibhiḥ navatattvam svarūpeṇa prakṛti ādi yathākramam

original: śodhanīyaṃ varārohe aṇūnāṃ citrabhogadam | ātmavidyāśivākhyaṃ tu tattvatrayamudāhṛtam || 186||
analyzed: śodhanīyam varārohe aṇūnām citra bhoga dam ātma vidyā śiva ākhyam tu tattva trayam udāhṛtam

original: mukhyāstvete samākhyātāḥ śodhanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ | etaiḥ śuddhaistu śudhyeta ṣaṭprakāro varānane || 187||
analyzed: mukhyāḥ tu ete samākhyātāḥ śodhanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ etaiḥ śuddhaiḥ tu śudhyeta ṣaṣ prakāraḥ varānane

original: tattvāntarbhāvitāḥ sarve draṣṭavyā parameśvari | sāṃprataṃ tu kalādhvānaṃ vakṣyāmi tava sundari || 188||
analyzed: tattva antar bhāvitāḥ sarve draṣṭavyā parameśvari sāṃpratam tu kalādhvānam vakṣyāmi tava sundari

original: kalābhirvyāpitaṃ tattvaṃ tattvaṃ vai kalarūpiṇam | kalārūpo mahādevaḥ sarvajñaḥ parameśvaraḥ || 189||
analyzed: kalābhiḥ vyāpitam tattvam tattvam vai kala rūpiṇam kalā rūpaḥ mahādevaḥ sarvajñaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistathaiva ca | śāntyātītā parā jñeyā pṛthivyādi kalāḥ smṛtāḥ || 190||
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntiḥ tathā eva ca śāntyātītā parā jñeyā pṛthivī ādi kalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: indhikā dīpikā caiva rocikā mocikā tathā | ūrdhvagāmī parā jñeyā sarvāsāṃ pūraṇī smṛtā || 191 ||
analyzed: indhikā dīpikā ca eva rocikā mocikā tathā ūrdhvagāmī parā jñeyā sarvāsām pūraṇī smṛtā

original: sūkṣmā caiva susūkṣmā ca tathā vai cāmṛtāmṛtā | śakteścātmakalā proktā vyāpinyādyāḥ śivasya tu || 192||
analyzed: sūkṣmā ca eva susūkṣmā ca tathā vai ca amṛtā amṛtā śakteḥ ca ātma kalā proktā vyāpinī ādyāḥ śivasya tu

original: vyāpinī vyomarūpā ca anantānāthanāśritā | kalādhvānaṃ samāsena kathitaṃ tava sundari || 193||
analyzed: vyāpinī vyoma rūpā ca ananta anātha nāśritā kalādhvānam samāsena kathitam tava sundari

original: eteṣvekatamaṃ śodhyaṃ deśikena mahātmanā | mantrādhvānaṃ tu saṃśodhyaṃ vidyayā tu parāparā || 194||
analyzed: eteṣu ekatamam śodhyam deśikena mahātmanā mantrādhvānam tu saṃśodhyam vidyayā tu parāparā

original: padaiḥ padādhvaviddīkṣā kartavyā samavidyayā | bhuvanādyā varārohe kartavyā śāstravittamaiḥ || 195||
analyzed: padaiḥ pada adhva vid dīkṣā kartavyā sama vidyayā bhuvana ādyā varārohe kartavyā śāstra vittamaiḥ

original: kālāgnimāditaḥ kṛtvā śivāntaṃ yāvadeva hi | ṣaṭprakāro vidhistveṣa varṇādhvāne yathākramam || 196||
analyzed: kālāgnim āditas kṛtvā śiva antam yāvat eva hi ṣaṣ prakāraḥ vidhiḥ tu eṣa varṇādhvāne

original: grahaṇaṃ yojanaṃ caiva viyogaṃ ca yathākramam | kartavyaṃ tu vipaścidbhi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā || 197||
analyzed: grahaṇam yojanam ca eva viyogam ca yathākramam kartavyam tu śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: eṣāmekatamaṃ devi śodhanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ | saṃskāraṃ vidhivatkṛtvā guruṇādhvānavedinā || 198||
analyzed: eṣām ekatamam devi śodhanīyam prayatnataḥ saṃskāram vidhivat kṛtvā guruṇā adhvāna vedinā

original: kartavyo 'nugraho devi paśūnāṃ ca yathākramam | sṛṣṭisaṃhārabhedena jñātvā kāmyānurūpataḥ || 199||
analyzed: kartavyaḥ nugrahaḥ devi paśūnām ca yathākramam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra bhedena jñātvā kāmya anurūpataḥ

original: tadā mukto varārohe pāśastobho yadā bhavet | pāśastobho yadā jāto nānyathā vīranāyike || 200||
analyzed: tadā muktaḥ varārohe pāśastobhaḥ yadā bhavet pāśastobhaḥ yadā jātaḥ na anyathā vīra nāyike
devī uvāca

original: śrutā dīkṣā mayā nātha ṣaḍvidhādhve yathā sthitā | sāṃprataṃ pāśaśaithilyaṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 201 ||
analyzed: śrutā dīkṣā mayā nātha ṣaḍvidha adhve yathā sthitā sāṃpratam pāśa śaithilyam śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: pāśāḥ sūkṣmāstu ye proktā māyotthā māyavarjitāḥ | | acetanā arūpāstu teṣāṃ stobho na vidyate || 202||
analyzed: pāśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ tu ye proktāḥ māyā utthāḥ māya varjitāḥ acetanāḥ arūpāḥ tu teṣām stobhaḥ na vidyate

original: paśoryaḥ kriyate stobhaḥ pāśastobha iti smṛtaḥ | caitanyaḥ pāśitaḥ pāśairanyonyaṃ vyāpya saṃsthitāḥ || 203||
analyzed: paśoḥ yaḥ kriyate stobhaḥ pāśastobhaḥ iti smṛtaḥ caitanyaḥ pāśitaḥ pāśaiḥ anyonyam vyāpya saṃsthitāḥ

original: dvābhyāṃ kasya bhavetstobhaḥ paśupāśātmakā prabho | mado mohaśca rāgaśca viṣādo śoṣameva ca || 204||
analyzed: dvābhyām kasya bhavet stobhaḥ paśu pāśa ātmakā prabho madaḥ mohaḥ ca rāgaḥ ca śoṣam eva ca

original: vaicittyaṃ harṣa-ākhyaśca saptaite sahajā malāḥ | dharmādharmātmako bandhaḥ tadātmā prakṛtisthitaḥ || 205 ||
analyzed: vaicittyam harṣaḥ ākhyaḥ ca saptā ete sahajāḥ malāḥ dharma adharma ātmakaḥ bandhaḥ tad ātmā prakṛti sthitaḥ

original: sūkṣmatvaṃ ca arūpatvaṃ cetanārahito yataḥ | sarveṣāṃ vidyate stobho muktaḥ kṣetrī sa cetanaḥ || 206 ||
analyzed: sūkṣma tvam ca arūpa tvam cetanā rahitaḥ yatas sarveṣām vidyate stobhaḥ muktaḥ kṣetrī sa cetanaḥ

original: tasmātstobho na vidyeta nirguṇe tu acetane | bhairava uvāca ātmā nityo amūrtaśca guṇahīnaśca niṣkriyaḥ || 207||
analyzed: tasmāt stobhaḥ na vidyeta nirguṇe tu acetane bhairavaḥ uvāca ātmā nityaḥ amūrtaḥ ca guṇa hīnaḥ ca niṣkriyaḥ

original: vyāghātabhājano jñeyaḥ śodhyo bodhyaḥ svabhāvataḥ | akalpaḥ paśuruktastu dharmādharmairadhiṣṭhitaḥ || 208||
analyzed: vyāghāta bhājanaḥ jñeyaḥ śodhyaḥ bodhyaḥ svabhāvataḥ akalpaḥ paśuḥ uktaḥ tu dharma adharmaiḥ adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ māyātmakairbandhaiḥ pāśitaḥ pāśapañjaraiḥ | yato 'nādi malaḥ tveko bījabhūto vyavasthitaḥ || 209 ||
analyzed: pūrvam māyā ātmakaiḥ bandhaiḥ pāśitaḥ pāśa pañjaraiḥ yatas nādi malaḥ tu ekaḥ bīja bhūtaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: praroha tvamiti dharma kṣetramāśṛtya suvrate | kṣetraṃ māyā bhavettasya sahajasya paśormalaḥ || 210||
analyzed: praroha tvam iti dharma kṣetram āśṛtya suvrate kṣetram māyā bhavet tasya sahajasya paśoḥ malaḥ

original: yathāśvatthakaṇaḥ kṣetre patitotthāya rohati | śākhāskandhasamākīrṇa kṣetramāśrayayogataḥ || 211 ||
analyzed: yathā aśvattha kaṇaḥ kṣetre patitā utthāya rohati śākhā skandha samākīrṇa kṣetram āśraya yogataḥ

original: evaṃ māyāśrito devi nityamāṇavako malaḥ | māyāpi sanimittatvātpravarteta aṇorhi sā || 212||
analyzed: evam māyā āśritaḥ devi nityam āṇavakaḥ malaḥ māyā api sa nimitta tvāt pravarteta aṇoḥ hi sā
animittasya deveśi nā eva māyā pravartate
kadācid bhavate pi evam śuddha adhvā na pravartanam

original: na śivo vidyate devi māyā hyekā bhavettadā
analyzed: na śivaḥ vidyate devi māyā hi ekā bhavet tadā

original: sā tu bandhasvabhāvotthā na mokṣaḥ tatra kasyacit || 214||
analyzed: sā tu bandha svabhāva utthā na mokṣaḥ tatra kasyacid
ayathā yathā yogaḥ yam pravarteta suraiḥ api

original: vidyeśādi smṛtā ye tu mokṣagāḥ parameśvari || 215||
analyzed: vidyeśa ādi smṛtāḥ ye tu mokṣa gāḥ parameśvari

original: na teṣāṃ bhavate mokṣo animittā yadā bhavet
analyzed: na teṣām bhavate mokṣaḥ animittā yadā bhavet

original: yathā mokṣo na vidyeta vidyamāne 'pi satpathe || 216 ||
analyzed: yathā mokṣaḥ na vidyeta vidyamāne sat pathe

original: yathā rājñassadoṣe tu bandho bandhe pravartate || 217||
analyzed: yathā rājñaḥ sa doṣe tu bandhaḥ bandhe pravartate
nirdoṣe bandhanam nā eva tadvat māyā prasajyate

original: āśrayaḥ sahajaḥ puṃsāṃ malo hyekaḥ prabandhakaḥ || 218||
analyzed: āśrayaḥ sahajaḥ puṃsām malaḥ hi ekaḥ prabandhakaḥ
tat āśritya pravarteta māyā saṃtāna bodhanī

original: bodhitaṃ māyayā tattvaṃ viśleṣaṃ caiva gacchati || 219 ||
analyzed: bodhitam māyayā tattvam viśleṣam ca eva gacchati
rāgeṇa rañjitaḥ ca asau buddhi ādi karaṇaiḥ yutaḥ
evam māyā ātmakaḥ bandhaḥ prasajyet anusaṃtatau
tad āśraya guṇaḥ dharmaḥ tu adharmaḥ ca samāsatas
tad ātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ pāśāḥ pāśitaḥ taiḥ tu tiṣṭhati

original: evaṃ jñātvā tu viśleṣamātma māyā śivasya tu || 222 ||
analyzed: evam jñātvā tu viśleṣam ātma māyā śivasya tu
pāśa śaithilyakam paścāt yathā bhavati tat śṛṇu
acetanaḥ yathā devi sarpa daṣṭaḥ gata āyuṣaḥ

original: calate spandate caiva tīrthaṃ vai preṣayanti hi
analyzed: calate spandate ca eva tīrtham vai preṣayanti hi
dṛśyate mantra sāmarthyāt kim atra pravicāryate
śilānām kampanam stobham sphoṭanam gatiḥ āgatiḥ
mṛta deha praveśam ca rūpa ādi parivartanam

original: hrasvatvaṃ ca kṛśatvaṃ ca nirgamaṃ jālakāntare
analyzed: hrasva tvam ca kṛśa tvam ca nirgamam jālaka antare
evaṃvidhāni siddhīni acintyāni tu suvrate
mantra sāmarthya bhāvena katham carcā śiva āgame
pramāṇāni yāni uktāni pratyakṣa ādīni śaṃbhunā

original: teṣāṃ tu pravaraṃ hyetatpratyakṣaṃ tu yaśasvini
analyzed: teṣām tu pravaram hi etat pratyakṣam tu yaśasvini

original: akṣaistu gṛhyate yacca tatrānyā kalpanā katham || 228 ||
analyzed: akṣaiḥ tu gṛhyate yat ca tatra anyā kalpanā katham
dharma adharma ātmakaḥ bandhaḥ ātmanaḥ yaḥ varānane

original: tasya caiva kṣayaḥ kāryo dīkṣayā parameśvari || 229 ||
analyzed: tasya ca eva kṣayaḥ kāryaḥ dīkṣayā parameśvari

original: kṛtāni yāni karmāṇīdānīṃ yāni karoti ca
analyzed: kṛtāni yāni karmāṇi idānīm yāni karoti ca
dīkṣayā hi kṣayaḥ teṣām piṇḍapātāt śivam vrajet
kṣīṇaiḥ doṣa ātmakaiḥ pāśaiḥ adharmaiḥ ye ca saṃsthitāḥ
ādhāraḥ na asti deveśi yena asau tiṣṭhate dhvani
pāśa muktaḥ yadā hi ātmā nirādhāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: patate kampate caiva chinnamūlo yataḥ priye || 232 ||
analyzed: patate kampate ca eva chinna mūlaḥ yatas priye
yathā vṛkṣaḥ bahirbhāvaiḥ chinnaḥ kampati bhū tale
patate ca na sandehaḥ tadvat ātmā prakīrtitaḥ
viyogaḥ ca eva pāśānām kartavyaḥ dīkṣayā vidbhiḥ

original: viyogastu yadā jātastadā stobho na saṃśayaḥ || 234||
analyzed: viyogaḥ tu yadā jātaḥ tadā stobhaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: stobho nāma samuddiṣṭaḥ kampanaṃ patanaṃ tathā
analyzed: stobhaḥ nāma samuddiṣṭaḥ kampanam patanam tathā
kāśyapī tala saṃsthasya yogaḥ ca eva nirāmaye
pāśastobhaḥ bhavati evam viyogam bandhanaiḥ saha

original: yathā baddhaḥ kvacidvṛkṣo mūlaiḥ śākhāntagaiḥ priye || 236 ||

vratinaḥ tu punar devi kṣetrapālāḥ bhavanti hi
yadi dīkṣā bhavet muktiḥ sarveṣu ca āgameṣu ca

original: tasmāddīkṣā tu boddhavyā pāśastobho yadā bhavet || 349 ||
analyzed: tasmāt dīkṣā tu boddhavyā pāśastobhaḥ yadā bhavet
dharma adharma nibaddhaḥ tu tatra patet priye

original: tadā nirvāṇadāṃ dīkṣāṃ yaḥ karoti sa deśikaḥ || 350 ||
analyzed: tadā nirvāṇa dām dīkṣām yaḥ karoti sa deśikaḥ
yena eva a labdha mātrasya stubhyate pāśa pañjaram
sa guruḥ tu samākhyātaḥ saṃsāra arṇava tārakaḥ
tasya pāda rajaḥ devi śirasā dhārayet yadi
tad kṣaṇāt eva mucyeta sarpasya kavacam yathā
saḥ ācāryaḥ samākhyātaḥ śiva sadbhāva bhāvitaḥ
tattva vid sa samākhyātaḥ stobhayet pāśa pañjaram
sa guruḥ tu samākhyātaḥ dharma artha kāma mokṣa daḥ
tulā vidhiḥ sāmpratam tu punar vakṣye tulāyāḥ vidhim uttamam

original: tulā paṭṭamayī kāryā lakṣaṇaṃ tasya kathyate |
analyzed: tulā paṭṭa mayī kāryā lakṣaṇam tasya kathyate
dīrgha tvam śākhayoḥ kāryam catur hasta pramāṇataḥ
vistāram trīṇi hastāni madhye hasta dvaya ardhataḥ
catur asrau samau kāryau om tri toraṇa samanvitau
madhye tu śṛṅkhalā kāryā kaṭaka traya saṃyutā

original: karṇau tu sudṛḍhau kāryoṃ sthūlau sandhitasandhitau || 357||
analyzed: karṇau tu su dṛḍhau kāryau om sthūlau sandhita sandhitau

original: evaṃ tataḥ prakalpyādau tulāṃ vai maṇḍapāgrataḥ |
analyzed: evam tatas prakalpya ādau tulām vai maṇḍapa agratas
adhivāsanam tatas kṛtvā gandha puṣpa pavitrakaiḥ
naivedyaiḥ bahubhiḥ bhūpaiḥ mantra nyāsam tu kārayet
dvitīye hani śiṣyasya taulya mānam samārabhet

original: samasūtraṃ tu taṃ taulyaṃ sikatāyāḥ sahaikataḥ |
analyzed: sama sūtram tu tam taulyam sikatāyāḥ
sama mānam tatas jñātvā ānayet agni pārśvataḥ

original: grahaṇaṃ śaktinā kāryaṃ sandhānaṃ śaktinā punaḥ |
analyzed: grahaṇam śaktinā kāryam sandhānam śaktinā punar
saṃśodhya kramaśas sarva adhvaneṣu yathākramam

original: yojayeta tato mantrī sakale niṣkale 'pi vā | sarvāśuddhinivṛttyarthaṃ bahurūpeṇa dāpayet || 362||
analyzed: yojayeta tatas mantrī sakale niṣkale vā sarva aśuddhi nivṛtti artham bahu rūpeṇa dāpayet

original: pūrṇāttu pūrṇatāṃ kuryādvidhiracchidratāṃ bhavet | ārohayettato mantrī sādhakaṃ śaktivigraham || 363||
analyzed: pūrṇāt tu pūrṇa tām kuryāt vidhiḥ acchidra tām bhavet ārohayet tatas mantrī sādhakam śakti vigraham

original: uccārya śaktinā tūrṇaṃ prāṇajīvasamāśritam | kaṇṭhayuktaṃ sabinduṃ ca yakāreṇātha dīpitam || 364||
analyzed: uccārya śaktinā tūrṇam prāṇajīva samāśritam kaṇṭha yuktam sa bindum ca yakāreṇa atha dīpitam

original: bhūṣaṇairvāmakarṇasya bhūṣitaṃ tu yathepsayā | laghutvaṃ bhavate devi gacchate cordhvata svayam || 365 ||
analyzed: bhūṣaṇaiḥ vāma karṇasya bhūṣitam tu yathā īpsayā laghu tvam bhavate devi gacchate svayam

original: śuddhaḥ pāpavinirmuktaḥ paraṃ pāraṃ ca gacchati | śuddhirevaṃ samākhyātā brahmaghnasyāpi śaṃbhunā || 366||
analyzed: śuddhaḥ pāpa vinirmuktaḥ param pāram ca gacchati śuddhiḥ evam samākhyātā brahma ghnasya api śaṃbhunā

original: gavaghnasyāpi kartavyā tulāśuddhi manīṣiṇā | evaṃ tulāviśuddhasya mokṣa ityabhiśabditaḥ || 367||
analyzed: gavaghnasya api kartavyā tulā śuddhi manīṣiṇā evam tulā viśuddhasya mokṣaḥ iti abhiśabditaḥ

original: [prasannāvidhiḥ] mṛteṣūddharaṇaṃ proktaṃ prasannāyā varānane | darpaṇaṃ cādhivāsyādau śiṣyaṃ kanyakayā saha || 368||
analyzed: prasannā vidhiḥ mṛteṣu uddharaṇam proktam prasannāyāḥ varānane darpaṇam ca adhivāsya ādau śiṣyam kanyakayā saha

original: dvitīye 'hani dīkṣā tu kartavyā śiva-adhvare | grahaṇaṃ hṛdayasthasya kartavyaṃ paśurātmanaḥ || 369||
analyzed: dvitīye hani dīkṣā tu kartavyā śiva adhvare grahaṇam hṛdaya sthasya kartavyam paśuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: tattvasthaṃ yojayetpaścācchuddhyarthaṃ bandhanāya tu | darpaṇasthā prapaśyanti kanyakā divyacakṣuṣā || 370||
analyzed: tattva stham yojayet paścāt śuddhi artham bandhanāya tu darpaṇa sthā prapaśyanti kanyakāḥ divya cakṣuṣā

original: yatra tatra sthitaṃ sūkṣme śarīre bhuvanādhvani | grahaṇaṃ yojayeddevi tattve tattve na saṃśayaḥ || 371||
analyzed: yatra tatra sthitam sūkṣme śarīre bhuvana adhvani grahaṇam yojayet devi tattve tattve na saṃśayaḥ

original: yāvadyuktaḥ pare tattve tāvadevaṃ prapaśyati | śaktinālabdhadṛṣṭā tu netrabījena suvrate || 372||
analyzed: yāvat yuktaḥ pare tattve tāvat evam prapaśyati śaktinā alabdha dṛṣṭā tu netra bījena suvrate

original: abhimantrya tato devi udakaṃ tu śatārdhataḥ | kṣālayennayane tāsāṃ darpaṇaṃ tu pradarśayet || 373 ||
analyzed: tatas devi udakam tu śatārdhataḥ kṣālayet nayane tāsām darpaṇam tu pradarśayet

original: paśyanti tatra tāḥ kanyāḥ śubhāśubhaphalāphalam | athānyaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi prasannāvidhimuttamam || 374||
analyzed: paśyanti tatra tāḥ kanyāḥ śubha aśubha phala aphalam atha anyam saṃpravakṣyāmi prasannā vidhim uttamam

original: oṃ namaścaṇḍikāyai yogavāhini pravarta pravarta mohaya mohaya yogamukhi yogeśvari mahāmāyādhāriṇi hiri hiri bhūtapriye svakāyaṃ paśyāmi bāḍhaṃ śṛṇomi svayaṃ jighrāmi sarvalokāni paśyāmi turu turu sādhaya sādhaya svāhā
analyzed: om namaḥ caṇḍikāyai yogavāhini pravarta pravarta mohaya mohaya yogamukhi yogeśvari mahāmāyā dhāriṇi hiri hiri bhūtapriye sva kāyam paśyāmi bāḍham śṛṇomi svayam jighrāmi sarva lokāni

original: rudrasthāne śucirbhūtvā sahasrā daśa yojayet | siddhā bhavati sā vidyā daśa karmāṇi kārayet || 375 ||
analyzed: rudra sthāne śuciḥ bhūtvā sahasrāḥ daśa yojayet siddhā bhavati sā vidyā daśa karmāṇi kārayet

original: candre sūrye 'thavā khaḍge darpaṇe vātha dīpake | aṅguṣṭhe vā ghaṭe vāpi dārikāṃ vātha dārakam || 376 ||
analyzed: candre sūrye khaḍge darpaṇe vā atha dīpake aṅguṣṭhe vā ghaṭe vā api dārikām vā atha dārakam

original: paśyāpayatyasaṃdehāttilāṃvā taṇḍulānataḥ | bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca pṛcchate kathayanti hi || 377||
analyzed: paśyāpayati asaṃdehāt tilān vā taṇḍulān atas bhūtam bhavyam bhaviṣyam ca pṛcchate kathayanti hi

original: atha vidyāṃ samāvartya rajānyāṃ svapayecchuciḥ | svayameva prapaśyeta svapnānte yacchubhāśubham || 378 ||
analyzed: atha vidyām samāvartya svapayet śuciḥ svayam eva prapaśyeta svapna ante yat śubha aśubham

original: oṃ rakte raktāṅguṣṭhe ucchuṣme avatara avatara piśācini kathaya kathaya kathāpaya kathāpaya svāhā
analyzed: om rakte raktāṅguṣṭhe ucchuṣme avatara avatara piśācini kathaya kathaya kathāpaya kathāpaya svāhā

original: khaṅga-m-ādarśake vātha aṅguṣṭhe vā varānane | paśyati kanyakā sarvaṃ śubhāśubhaphalāphalam || 379||
analyzed: ādarśake vā atha aṅguṣṭhe vā varānane paśyati kanyakā sarvam śubha aśubha phala aphalam
om piṅgali pāśupati mahāvidye svāhā

original: eṣā vidyā mahādevi karma kurvanti saptadhā | oṃ rakte virakte avatara 2 mātaṅgini svāhā
analyzed: eṣā vidyā mahādevi karma kurvanti saptadhā om rakte virakte avatara mātaṅgini svāhā

original: navavidhaṃ syādyatkarma eṣā vidyā karoti hi || 380 ||
analyzed: navavidham syāt yat karma eṣā vidyā karoti hi

original: saptabhirmantritaṃ hastaṃ kṛtvā svaurasi vinyaset | svayameva hi jānāti mantrasyāsya prabhāvataḥ || 381 ||
analyzed: saptabhiḥ mantritam hastam kṛtvā sva orasi vinyaset svayam eva hi jānāti mantrasya asya prabhāvataḥ
om namaḥ caṇḍikāyai avatara turu svāhā

original: sopavāsaḥ śucirbhūtvā aṣṭautkṛṣṭaśataṃ japet | rātrau svapne tvavatīrya kathayedyacchubhāśubham || 382 ||
analyzed: sa upavāsaḥ śuciḥ bhūtvā aṣṭa autkṛṣṭaśatam japet rātrau svapne tu avatīrya kathayet yat śubha aśubham

original: sarvāsāṃ caiva vidyānāṃ caṇḍikāgṛhamāśritaḥ | daśasāhasriko jāpyastataḥ karmāṇi kārayet || 383 ||
analyzed: sarvāsām ca eva vidyānām caṇḍikā gṛham āśritaḥ daśa sāhasrikaḥ jāpyaḥ tatas karmāṇi kārayet

original: evaṃ parīkṣya hetvarthe jijñāsārthaṃ svayaṃbhunā | kathitaṃ sarahasyaṃ tu dīkṣākarma suvistaram || 384||
analyzed: evam parīkṣya hetu arthe jijñāsā artham svayaṃbhunā kathitam sa rahasyam tu dīkṣā karma su vistaram

original: dīkṣitāya praśāntāya abhiṣiktāya śobhane | samayīputrake vāpi sādhake ca varānane || 385||
analyzed: dīkṣitāya praśāntāya abhiṣiktāya śobhane samayīputrake vā api sādhake ca varānane

original: nākhyeyaṃ nādhikāriṇye satyamīśena bhāṣitam | cumbake śrāvaṇīyaṃ tu vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā || 386||
analyzed: na ākhyeyam na adhikāriṇye satyam īśena bhāṣitam cumbake śrāvaṇīyam tu vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
devī ūvaca

original: cumbakaścādhikārī syātsarvasya parameśvara | tasyābhiṣecanaṃ śambho kalaśādeva taiḥ saha || 387||
analyzed: cumbakaḥ ca adhikārī syāt sarvasya parameśvara tasya abhiṣecanam śambho kalaśāt eva taiḥ saha

original: kuṇḍaṃ ca mekhalā caiva srucyā ca sruvameva ca || 388||
analyzed: kuṇḍam ca mekhalā ca eva srucyā ca sruvam eva ca

original: jihvādidevatāvaktra pramāṇaṃ śabdasaṃyutam | jvālānāṃ gandhavarṇaṃ ca pūrṇā srucyā grahaṃ tathā | etanme saṃśayo nātha yannoktaṃ tadbravīhi me || 389||
analyzed: jihvā ādi devatā vaktra pramāṇam śabda saṃyutam jvālānām gandha varṇam ca pūrṇā srucyā graham tathā etat me saṃśayaḥ nātha yat na uktam tat bravīhi me
kalaśa lakṣaṇam bhairavaḥ uvāca

original: aṣṭau kalaśā samāhṛtya sauvarṇā rājatāpi vā | tāmramṛnmayataḥ kāryāḥ sudṛḍhā nivraṇāḥ śubhāḥ || 390 ||
analyzed: aṣṭau samāhṛtya sauvarṇāḥ rājatā api vā tāmra mṛd mayataḥ kāryāḥ su dṛḍhāḥ nivraṇāḥ śubhāḥ

original: kambugrīvā bṛhatkukṣā akṛṣṇā pralamboṣṭhā | gandhodakena pūryādau cūtapallavaśobhitāḥ || 391||
analyzed: kambu grīvā bṛhat kukṣā akṛṣṇā pralamba uṣṭhā gandha udakena pūrya ādau cūta pallava śobhitāḥ

original: sitavastrāvṛtā kāryā sitacandanacarcitā | śuklamālyairalaṃkṛtya ratnagarbhāḥ samodarāḥ || 392||
analyzed: sita vastra āvṛtā kāryā sita candana carcitā śukla mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya ratna garbhāḥ sama udarāḥ

original: kṣārādi vinyasetteṣu samudrāḥ kalaśeṣu vai | garbhodāntāḥ smṛtāḥ cāṣṭau vidyeśā lokapālakāḥ || 393||
analyzed: kṣāra ādi vinyaset teṣu samudrāḥ kalaśeṣu vai garbha udāntāḥ smṛtāḥ ca aṣṭau vidyeśāḥ lokapālakāḥ

original: vargāṣṭakasamanyastā abhiṣekaṃ tu kārayet | athavaikena kartavyā kalpanā sakalā priye || 394||
analyzed: varga aṣṭaka sama nyastāḥ abhiṣekam tu kārayet athavā ekena kartavyā kalpanā sakalā priye

original: kalaśaikena vā kāryo abhiṣeko varānane | samastakṛtabhūtārtho yathā śāstre pracoditaḥ || 395||
analyzed: kalaśa ekena vā kāryaḥ abhiṣekaḥ varānane samasta kṛta bhūta arthaḥ yathā śāstre pracoditaḥ

original: tattathā tu prakartavyamanyathā doṣabhājanam | abhiṣiktastato mantrī sitacandanacarcitaḥ || 396 ||
analyzed: tat tathā tu prakartavyam anyathā doṣa bhājanam abhiṣiktaḥ tatas mantrī sita candana carcitaḥ

original: sitavastradharaḥ sragvī ānayeddevasaṃnidhau | namaskāraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā nipateddaṇḍavadbhūvi || 397||
analyzed: sita vastra dharaḥ sragvī ānayet deva saṃnidhau namaskāram tatas kṛtvā nipatet daṇḍa vat bhūvi

original: [kuṇḍalakṣaṇam] nītvā cāgnisamīpe tu homaṃ kuryātsadā budhaḥ | rattimātraṃ ca deveśi athavā muṣṭimānataḥ || 398||
analyzed: kuṇḍa lakṣaṇam nītvā ca agni samīpe tu homam kuryāt sadā budhaḥ ratti mātram ca deveśi athavā muṣṭi mānataḥ

original: kuṇḍaṃ ca hastamātraṃ syāccaturhastaṃ trimekhalam | vṛttaṃ vā kārayenmantrī svecchayā divyavasthitam || 399 ||
analyzed: kuṇḍam ca hasta mātram syāt catur hastam tri mekhalam vṛttam vā kārayet mantrī sva icchayā divi avasthitam

original: kuṇḍeṣu hīnamāneṣu mekhalārahiteṣu ca | khaṇḍasphuṭitavaktreṣu vilome homamārabhet || 400||
analyzed: kuṇḍeṣu hīna māneṣu mekhalā rahiteṣu ca khaṇḍa sphuṭita vaktreṣu vilome homam ārabhet

original: dyaṅguṣṭhaparvavaipulyā prathamā mekhalā bhavet | dvitīyā ca tribhijñeyā caturbhiśvopari sthitā || 401 ||
analyzed: prathamā mekhalā bhavet dvitīyā ca tribhiḥ jñeyā caturbhiḥ śva upari sthitā

original: yonirnavāṅgulā sapta athavā dvādaśāṅgulā | gajoṣṭhasadṛśādhastādoṣṭhaṃ tasyāṅgulāyatam ||402||
analyzed: yoniḥ nava aṅgulā sapta athavā dvādaśa aṅgulā gaja uṣṭha sadṛśā adhastāt oṣṭham tasya aṅgula āyatam

original: trikoṇaṃ dīrghavaktraṃ ca māraṇoccāṭane hitam | vidveṣaṇe ca kartavyaṃ lakṣaṇena vivarjitam ||403||
analyzed: tri koṇam dīrgha vaktram ca māraṇa uccāṭane hitam vidveṣaṇe ca kartavyam lakṣaṇena vivarjitam

original: ekakarmānusāreṇa kuṇḍaṃ kuryātprasiddhidam | nityanaimittike home śāntike vā varānane ||404||
analyzed: eka karma anusāreṇa kuṇḍam kuryāt prasiddhi dam nitya naimittike home śāntike vā varānane
hasta mātra pramāṇena kuṇḍam syāt phala dāyakam
dvi karam daśa sāhasre lakṣa home catuṣkaram

original: ṣaḍhastaṃ prayutākhye tu home ca varavarṇini |
analyzed: ṣaṣ hastam prayuta ākhye tu home ca varavarṇini
koṭi home ca kartavyam aṣṭa hastam su śobhanam
hasta mātrasya kuṇḍasya mekhalāḥ yāḥ prakīrttitāḥ

original: tāścaiva dviguṇā vṛddhyā aṣṭahaste tu kārayet || 407||
analyzed: tāḥ ca eva dviguṇāḥ vṛddhyāḥ aṣṭa haste tu kārayet

original: bāhumātrakarau tau tu suksruvau ca śubhau matau |
analyzed: bāhu mātra karau tau tu su ksruvau ca śubhau matau
vaikaṅkata śamīgarbha palāśa khadira udbhavau
anyeṣu ca śubha ekena lakṣaṇena vilakṣitau
kuryāt śubheṣu homeṣu viparīteṣu atas nyathā
vibhītaka mahāvṛkṣa tindu śālmali sambhavau
śūla kāṣṭha udbhavau vā atha gardabha asthi nara asthi jau
māna hīnau praśastau ca vaktrau ca sphuṭitau ubhau
sarvathā sarva yatnena śobhana artha ūm vipaścitā
vakra sphuṭita hīnau ca śubha vṛkṣa mayau api

original: varjitavyau prayatnena suksruvau ca śubhau yadi || 412||
analyzed: varjitavyau prayatnena suk sruvau ca śubhau yadi
ca karṣikā ādhāram su srucyā catuṣpala anvitā
dvādaśa aṅgula vistīrṇāḥ itaram syāt aṅgula dvayam
madhyamā aṅgula vaipulyam caturviṃśa aṅgula āyatā
ṣaṣ aṅgula parīṇāhā suci padma vilāñchitā
śaṅkha svastika vajra aṅkam atha cakra vilañchitam
kṛtvā hi evaṃvidhām mantrī ālabheta atha pāṇinā
homaya indu airava agnau tu mantra vid su samāhitaḥ
agni lakṣaṇam agni kāryam prakurvīta jihvā lakṣaṇa tattva vid
siddhi asiddhi vidhāna jñaḥ varṇa rūpa hutāśane
agni sthāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ agni rūpaḥ maheśvaraḥ
tasya mantra ātmikā mūrtiḥ ājyam vai soma saṃbhavam

original: agnestu devatāḥ sarvā mukhe vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ ||418||
analyzed: agneḥ tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ mukhe vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ
saptajihvā vidhāna jñaḥ homa karma samārabhet
jihvā bhedam a jānantā juhuyāt yaḥ hutāśane
yat asau ārabhate karma tat sarvam niṣphalam bhavet
hutvā d agni vidhānena ājya āhutyā pratarpitaḥ
tuṣyate yajamānasya sa patnīkaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ
aṅguṣṭha parva vistīrṇāḥ bahu havya indhane śikhāḥ
ekībhūtāḥ tu tiṣṭhanti su alpa havya indhanena tu
agnikuṇḍa pramāṇena mukham etat bhutāśane
jvālā mālā sahasraiḥ tu pātāla vadanam tu tat
agnaiḥ prabodhanam kṛtvā jihvām lakṣet vidhānataḥ
devatā rūpakam ca eva phalam yasya eva yādṛśam
pūrva paścimataḥ jihvāgrahāḥ tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: homakāle prayatnena dve jive caiva varjayet |
analyzed: homa kāle prayatnena dve jive ca eva varjayet

original: prathamā dharmajihvā tu nīlavarṇā tu sā smṛtā || 425||
analyzed: prathamā dharmajihvā tu nīla varṇā tu sā smṛtā
dvitīyā yakṣajihvā tu tāmra ākārā sama prabhā
tṛtīyā saumya daivatyā śukla varṇā amṛta upamā

original: yamajihvā caturthī ca kṛṣṇavarṇā tu sā smṛtā |

analyzed: uṣṇīṣa rahitam da tvā praviśya śiva sannidhau vijñāyet parameśānam sādhakaḥ yam mayā kṛtaḥ
siddhiḥ bhavatu bhaktitaḥ sādhya mantra uccaret paścāt puṣpa udaka samanvitam

original: tasya haste samaryeta siddhyarthaṃ sādhakasya tu | praṇamyobhau gṛhītvā tu mantraṃ hṛdi niveśayet || 535 ||
analyzed: tasya haste siddhi artham sādhakasya tu praṇamya ubhau gṛhītvā tu mantram hṛdi niveśayet

original: prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śiṣya ācāryo 'pi suhṛṣṭavān | ubhau nirgatya cāgnau tu tarpayenmantrasaṃhitām || 536 ||
analyzed: prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ śiṣyaḥ ācāryaḥ ubhau nirgatya ca agnau tu tarpayet mantra saṃhitām

original: sahasreṇa śatenātha sādhyamantrasya tarpaṇam | evaṃ santarpayitvā tu puṣpaṃ pāṇau pradāpayet || 537||
analyzed: sahasreṇa śatena atha sādhya mantrasya tarpaṇam evam santarpayitvā tu puṣpam pāṇau pradāpayet

original: tristhaṃ saṃpūjayitvā tu tripradakṣiṇa daṇḍavat | praṇamya bhaktiyuktātmā aṇimādiphalāpnuyāt || 538||
analyzed: tristham saṃpūjayitvā tu daṇḍa vat praṇamya bhakti yukta ātmā aṇima ādi phala āpnuyāt

original: utthāpya sādhakaṃ brūyātsamayāṃ pāla yatnataḥ | dīkṣāvasāne deveśi śravaṇīyā vipaścitaiḥ || 539 ||
analyzed: utthāpya sādhakam brūyāt samayām pāla yatnataḥ dīkṣā avasāne deveśi śravaṇīyā

original: evaṃ dīkṣāṃ vinirvatrtya sarvadaiva varānane | anujñātābhiṣiktasya samayāṃ śrāvayedguruḥ || 540||
analyzed: evam dīkṣām vinirvatrtya sarvadā eva varānane anujñāta abhiṣiktasya samayām śrāvayet guruḥ

original: anivedya na bhoktavyaṃ khādennāvidhināmiṣam | niṣphalāṃ varjayecceṣṭāṃ japadhyānaṃ tu kārayet || 541 ||
analyzed: a nivedya na bhoktavyam khādet na avidhinā āmiṣam niṣphalām varjayet ceṣṭām japa dhyānam tu kārayet

original: rereśabdaṃ na coccārya heheśabdaṃ tathaiva ca | na nagnāṃ vanitāṃ paśyenna cāpi prakaṭastanīm || 542 ||
analyzed: rere śabdam na ca uccārya hehe śabdam tathā eva ca na nagnām vanitām paśyet na ca api prakaṭa stanīm

original: nālokayetpaśukrīḍāṃ kṣudrakarmaṃ na kārayet | śākinīti na vaktavyaṃ dhappaṭiṃ varavarṇini || 543 ||
analyzed: na ālokayet paśu krīḍām kṣudra karmam na kārayet śākinī iti na vaktavyam dhappaṭim varavarṇini

original: cchiṇḍālī ca mahādevi sehārī naiva-m-uccaret | gṛhiṇāpi varārohe mahāsiddhividhau sthite || 544||
analyzed: chiṇḍālī ca mahādevi sehārī na eva uccaret gṛhiṇā api varārohe mahā siddhi vidhau sthite

original: grāmadharmaṃ na karttavyaṃ vāsare siddhimicchatā | svaśāstrasūcitaṃ karma nityaṃ tadvinirvarttayet || 545 ||
analyzed: grāma dharmam na karttavyam vāsare siddhim icchatā sva śāstra sūcitam karma nityam tat vinirvarttayet

original: sarvarakṣārthakāryeṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ | avyāpāraṃ sadā loke yuktāyuktavicāraṇe || 546 ||
analyzed: sarva rakṣā artha kāryeṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ a vyāpāram sadā loke yukta a yukta vicāraṇe

original: nopadhāvetsadā lokāṃ svādhyāyasya kṣatiryathā | sarve te varjayedarthāḥ svādhyāyakṣatikārakāḥ || 547||
analyzed: na upadhāvet sadā svādhyāyasya kṣatiḥ yathā sarve te varjayet arthāḥ svādhyāya kṣati kārakāḥ
svādhyāyasya virodhena sarvam etat nirarthakam vṛṣa kurkuṭa māyūra haṃsa vārāham eva ca

original: mahiṣaṃ mānuṣaṃ godhā ulūkaṃ gṛdhaṃ śyenakam | chagī mṛgī tathā meṣī sunakhī ca sṛgālikā || 549 ||
analyzed: mahiṣam mānuṣam godhā ulūkam gṛdham śyenakam chagī mṛgī tathā meṣī sunakhī ca sṛgālikā

original: śaśikā śalikā caiva yāścānyastrī vijānatā | abhojyamāmiṣaṃ tāsāṃ manasā yajjugupsitam || 550 ||
analyzed: śaśikā śalikā ca eva yāḥ ca anya strī vijānatā abhojyam āmiṣam tāsām manasā yat jugupsitam

original: varṣāstu navabhiścaiva liṅgacchāyāṃ na laṅghayet | samayī putrakaṃ caiva ācāryaṃ sādhakaṃ tathā || 551||
analyzed: varṣāḥ tu navabhiḥ ca eva liṅga chāyām na laṅghayet samayī putrakam ca eva ācāryam sādhakam tathā

original: na nindeta varārohe yoginīṃ naiva-m-uccaret | kaivartaṃ kāndukaṃ mlecchaṃ dhvajaṃ śūnyakaraṃ priye || 552||
analyzed: na nindeta varārohe yoginīm na eva uccaret kaivartam kāndukam mleccham dhvajam śūnyakaram priye

original: vairūpyaṃ duḥkhitaṃ śaṇṭhaṃ klībamandhaṃ tathāturaṃ | mallavandinakauṣadyaṃ chippakaṃ carmakārakam || 553 ||
analyzed: vairūpyam duḥkhitam śaṇṭham klībam andham tathā āturam malla vandina kauṣadyam chippakam carmakārakam

original: jaṭṭa bhuṭṭa mathīraṃ ca kāpotaṃ kulabhakṣakam | medaṃ bhillaṃ ca ḍombaṃ ca tathānyaṃ bhaṇḍakārakam || 554||
analyzed: jaṭṭa bhuṭṭa mathīram ca kāpotam kulabhakṣakam medam bhillam ca ḍombam ca tathā anyam bhaṇḍakārakam

original: evamanye 'pi ye noktā mānavā varavarṇini | na nindeta varārohe vratinaṃ yadupasthitam || 555||
analyzed: evam anye ye na uktāḥ mānavāḥ varavarṇini na nindeta varārohe vratinam yat upasthitam
haṭṭa nāryaḥ na vaktavyāḥ na ākrośet kanyakāḥ sudhīḥ
devyāyāḥ na uccaret dhāmam pādamīkāra saṃyutam

original: jhakāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca noccaredekataḥ kvacit | vaibhāṣyaṃ na vadetkiṃcinna ca sāhasamācaret || 557||
analyzed: jhakāram ca makāram ca na uccaret ekatas kvacid vaibhāṣyam na vadet kiṃcid na ca sāhasam ācaret

original: śayanaṃ naiva kartavyamekavṛkṣe catuṣpathe | kṣetre caiva śmaśāne ca vane copavaneṣu ca || 558||
analyzed: śayanam nā eva kartavyam eka vṛkṣe catuṣpathe kṣetre ca eva śmaśāne ca vane ca upavaneṣu ca

original: devāgāre nadītīre bhasmagomayamadhyataḥ | viṇmūtraṃ naiva kartavyaṃ ṣṭhīvanaṃ maithunaṃ tathā || 559||
analyzed: devāgāre nadī tīre bhasma gomaya madhyataḥ viṣ mūtram na eva kartavyam ṣṭhīvanam maithunam tathā

original: khaṭṭṭāpādaṃ gharaṭaṃ ca śūrpa vardhanikā tathā | pīṣaṇī kaṇḍaṇī cullī muśalaṃ loṣṭanīkaṇam || 560
analyzed: khaṭṭṭāpādam gharaṭam ca śūrpa vardhanikā tathā pīṣaṇī kaṇḍaṇī cullī muśalam loṣṭanī kaṇam

original: saṃmārjitaṃ ca nāvā ca yā ca pūjā na hi kṛtā | nākrameta varārohe prāṅgaṇaṃ dehalīṃ tathā || 561
analyzed: saṃmārjitam ca nāvā ca yā ca pūjā na hi kṛtā na ākrameta varārohe prāṅgaṇam dehalīm tathā

original: manthānaṃ nāgaraṃ caiva viṣaṃ vai nāyikā tathā | krūrikāryāparā bhadre māyīkaṃ gāhanī tathā || 562
analyzed: manthānam nāgaram ca eva viṣam vai nāyikā tathā krūri kāryā aparā bhadre māyīkam gāhanī tathā

original: yūpamaṅkuśa chatraṃ vā phalaṃ śakti samudgaram | śaṅkha cakraṃ gadāṃ śūlaṃ ghaṇṭaḍamaru picchakam || 563
analyzed: yūpam aṅkuśa chatram vā phalam śakti sa mudgaram śaṅkha cakram gadām śūlam ghaṇṭa ḍamaru picchakam

original: kapālamakṣasūtraṃ ca yogapaṭṭakamaṇḍalum | daṇḍājinaṃ pavitrakaṃ paraśuṃ paṭṭiśaṃ tathā || 564
analyzed: kapālam akṣasūtram ca yogapaṭṭa kamaṇḍalum daṇḍa ajinam pavitrakam paraśum paṭṭiśam tathā

original: gaṇḍāsakaṃ kuṭhāraṃ ca campanī vāśi vedanam | kodālakaṃ ca koddālī pādayoḥ kuṭakaṃ tathā || 565
analyzed: gaṇḍāsakam kuṭhāram ca campanī vedanam kodālakam ca koddālī pādayoḥ kuṭakam tathā

original: dhanuṃ nārāca bhallī ca tīrikā śara kaṃbaram | puṭaṃ ca karṇikaṃ kūṭamardhacandraṃ vilumpakam || 566
analyzed: dhanum nārāca bhallī ca tīrikā śara kaṃbaram puṭam ca karṇikam kūṭam ardhacandram vilumpakam

original: vāvallakaṃ tathāsthoḍaṃ sillaṃ ca ghātanaṃ tathā | daṃhikā karṇikaṃ jhaṣakaṃ kuntaṃ ca vasunandakam || 567
analyzed: vāvallakam sillam ca ghātanam tathā daṃhikā karṇikam jhaṣakam kuntam ca vasunandakam

original: karttavyā kurttarī caiva karttikā pādavellakam | pharakaṃ vāpi khaṅgaṃ vā anya vāpyāyudhaṃ priye ||568
analyzed: karttavyā kurttarī ca eva karttikā pāda vellakam vā api khaṅgam vā vā api āyudham priye

original: pāde naiva spṛśenmantrī na tu laṃghetkadācana | vaṭāśvatthārkapatre ca na bhuñjīta kadācana || 569
analyzed: pāde nā eva spṛśet mantrī na tu laṃghet kadācana vaṭa aśvattha arka patre ca na bhuñjīta kadācana

original: na mantrī bhakṣayedbhakṣāṃ vāmahastasthitānaghe | vāmahastena dātavyaṃ dakṣiṇena tu dāpayet || 570
analyzed: na mantrī bhakṣayet bhakṣām vāma hasta sthita anaghe vāma hastena dātavyam dakṣiṇena tu dāpayet

original: gṛhṇīyātparadattaṃ tu vāmahaste sadā priye | na dadyādauṣadhaṃ mantrī rakṣārthaṃ naiva kārayet || 571
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt para dattam tu vāma haste sadā priye na dadyāt auṣadham mantrī rakṣā artham nā eva kārayet

original: na jalpaṃ śivaśāstreṣu kartavyaṃ tu parasparam | avākyaṃ naiva vaktavyamadhikāravidhau sthite || 572
analyzed: na jalpam śiva śāstreṣu kartavyam tu parasparam avākyam nā eva vaktavyam adhikāra vidhau sthite

original: vīragoṣṭhī na bhagnavyā nopekṣeta viḍambakam | parairevātmanāpirvā vitaṇḍā naiva kārayet || 573
analyzed: vīragoṣṭhī na bhagnavyā nā upekṣeta viḍambakam paraiḥ eva ātmanāpiḥ vā vitaṇḍāḥ nā eva kārayet

original: rudrasthānāni sarvāṇi śrīpūrvāṇyābhibhāṣayet | guroḥ saṃjñā na gṛhṇīyānmahimā saṃsthitaḥ sudhīḥ || 574
analyzed: rudra sthānāni sarvāṇi śrī pūrvāṇyā abhibhāṣayet guroḥ saṃjñāḥ na gṛhṇīyāt mahimā saṃsthitaḥ sudhīḥ

original: śayyāsanaṃ vimuktā tu puṣpaṃ pāṇau vigṛhya ca | praṇamya daṇḍavadbhūmau śrīkārādyaṃ samuccaret || 575
analyzed: śayyā āsanam vimuktā tu puṣpam pāṇau vigṛhya ca praṇamya daṇḍa vat bhūmau śrīkāra ādyam samuccaret

original: sthānanāma tato 'nte tu devo antata eva vā | tathaiva guruparvasya siddhācāryā maheśvari || 576
analyzed: sthāna nāma tatas nte tu devaḥ antataḥ eva vā tathā eva guru parvasya siddha ācāryāḥ maheśvari

original: evaṃ devi samākhyātā samayāḥ samayārthinām | śrāvayedgarurevaṃ tu śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā | traiṣkālyaṃ pūjayeddevaṃ dhyānadṛṣṭena karmaṇā || 577||
analyzed: evam devi samākhyātā samayāḥ samaya arthinām śrāvayet garuḥ evam tu śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā traiṣkālyam pūjayet devam dhyāna dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: || iti bhairavasrotasi mahātantre vidyāpīṭhe saptakoṭipramāṇe śrītantrasadbhāve samayadīkṣādhikāro navamaḥ paṭalaḥ || chommakādhikāro nāmāṣṭādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ || devyuvāca || yoginīlakṣaṇaṃ deva śākinīnāṃ ca krīḍanam | seharikānāṃ ceṣṭā vai śrutaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ || 1
analyzed: iti bhairavasrotasi mahātantre vidyāpīṭhe sapta koṭi pramāṇe śrī tantrasadbhāve samayadīkṣādhikāraḥ navamaḥ paṭalaḥ chommakādhikāraḥ nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ devī uvāca yoginī

original: saṃgamaṃ ca yathā tāsāṃ viśeṣādavadhāritam | chommakāṃ śrotumicchāmi bhāṣāṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ || 2
analyzed: saṃgamam ca yathā tāsām viśeṣāt avadhāritam chommakām śrotum icchāmi bhāṣām ca eva viśeṣataḥ

original: chommakairśātamātraistu tāsāṃ tu saṃmato bhavet | sidhyanti sādhakasyaiva mudrāchommakatatparāḥ || 3
analyzed: chommakaiḥ śāta mātraiḥ tu tāsām tu saṃmataḥ bhavet sidhyanti sādhakasya eva mudrā chommaka tatparāḥ

original: bhairava uvāca athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi chommakānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam | aṅgāvayavasaṃsparśermantrabhāṣāviceṣṭitaiḥ ||4
analyzed: bhairavaḥ uvāca atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi chommakānām tu lakṣaṇam aṅga avayava saṃsparśeḥ mantra bhāṣā viceṣṭitaiḥ

original: vadanti mātaro yena sādhakaistāḥ parasparam | tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ hi aṅgācchommakalakṣaṇam || 5
analyzed: vadanti mātaraḥ yena sādhakaiḥ tāḥ parasparam tad vidhānam śṛṇudhvam hi aṅgāt śommaka lakṣaṇam

original: hastena spṛśate hastamabhivādakṛtaṃ bhavet | anāmādarśane caiva pratyabhivādanakṛtaṃ bhavati || 6
analyzed: hastena spṛśate hastam abhivāda kṛtam bhavet a nāma a darśane ca eva pratyabhivādana kṛtam bhavati

original: hastena hastaṃ vādayate baliṃ bhoktuṃ samīhate | lalāṭaṃ spṛśate yā tu kutrāgacchāmi bhāṣate || 7
analyzed: hastena hastam vādayate balim bhoktum samīhate lalāṭam spṛśate yā tu kutra āgacchāmi bhāṣate

original: nābhiṃ spṛśate yā tu bubhukṣitāsmīti bhāṣate | stanaṃ spṛśate yā tu mātaramityuktaṃ bhavati || 8
analyzed: nābhim spṛśate yā tu bubhukṣitā asmi iti bhāṣate stanam spṛśate yā tu mātaram iti uktam bhavati

original: kurparaṃ spṛśate yā tu yāsyāmīti ca jalpate | jihvālālayamānāṃ tu mānuṣyaṃ māṃsa bhakṣayāmīti || 9
analyzed: kurparam spṛśate yā tu yāsyāmi iti ca jalpate jihvā lālayamānām tu mānuṣyam māṃsa bhakṣayāmi iti

original: akṣiṃ spṛśate dṛśyena na nivartayāmīti | pārśva spṛśati nāsti mokṣamityuktaṃ bhavati || 10
analyzed: akṣim spṛśate dṛśyena na nivartayāmi iti spṛśati na asti mokṣam iti uktam bhavati

original: keśasparśanā prasādaṃ karomīti | pādena pādaṃ spṛśati ramāmītyuktaṃ bhavati || 11
analyzed: keśa sparśanā prasādam karomi iti pādena pādam spṛśati ramāmi iti uktam bhavati

original: dantānkaṭakaṭāpayati āhāraṃ dehītyuktaṃ bhavati | ubhe dantapaṅktī jihvāyā spṛśati tadā tṛpto 'sminniti || 12
analyzed: dantān kaṭakaṭāpayati āhāram dehi iti uktam bhavati ubhe danta paṅktī jihvāyāḥ spṛśati tadā smin iti

original: pādāgraṃ spṛśati mriyate na gantavyamiti | niṣśrūyate nāstikarmamityuktaṃ bhavati || 13
analyzed: pāda agram spṛśati mriyate na gantavyam iti niṣśrūyate nāstikarmam iti uktam bhavati

original: ubhau hastau sākhāṃ darśayedyā tu utpalaṃ tasyāḥ pradarśayet | haste puṭāṃ prakurute hastaṃ tasya prasārayet || 14
analyzed: ubhau hastau sākhām darśayet yā tu utpalam tasyāḥ pradarśayet haste puṭām prakurute hastam tasya prasārayet

original: hastaṃ kaṇḍūyate yā tu lalāṭaṃ tasya kaṇḍūyate | stanaṃ kaṇḍūyamānā yā haste 'śrūṇi nipātayet || 15
analyzed: hastam kaṇḍūyate yā tu lalāṭam tasya kaṇḍūyate stanam kaṇḍūyamānā yā haste śrūṇi nipātayet

original: pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ likhedaṅguṣṭhaṃ tasyā nipātayet | pādāvāsphālayedyā tu sphijastasyaivāphālayet || 16
analyzed: pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmim likhet aṅguṣṭham tasyāḥ nipātayet pādau āsphālayet yā tu sphijaḥ tasya eva āphālayet

original: tailābhyaktā paśyate yā muktiṃ tasyāḥ pradāpayet | nāsikāgraṃ darśayedyā jihvāṃ tasyā pradarśayet || 17
analyzed: taila abhyaktā paśyate yā muktim tasyāḥ pradāpayet nāsikā agram darśayet yā jihvām pradarśayet

original: lalāṭaṃ darśayedyā tu grīvāṃ tasya pradāpayet | pottuṅgetyabhivādanaṃ pratyottuṅge pratikṛtam || 18
analyzed: lalāṭam darśayet yā tu grīvām tasya pradāpayet pottuṅga iti abhivādanam pratyottuṅge pratikṛtam

original: ekāṅgulidarśanātsvāgataṃ dyābhyāṃ susvāgatam | koṣṭhapratibimbā cāṅguṣṭhaṃ kṣemamudrā vidhīyate || 19
analyzed: eka aṅguli darśanāt svāgatam dyābhyām su svāgatam koṣṭha pratibimbā ca aṅguṣṭham kṣemamudrā vidhīyate

original: jihvā darśayatedyā tu dantāntasya darśayet | śiro darśayatedyā tu lalāṭaṃ tasya darśayet || 20
analyzed: jihvā darśayatā idyā tu danta antasya darśayet śiraḥ darśayatā idyā tu lalāṭam tasya darśayet

original: keśā darśayate-d-yā tu śikhāntasyāstu darśayet | cibukaṃ darśayatedyā tu karṇaṃ tasya pradarśayet || 21
analyzed: keśāḥ darśayate yā tu śikhā antasyāḥ tu darśayet cibukam darśayate id yā tu karṇam tasya pradarśayet

original: grīvāṃ darśayatedyā tu bāhuṃ tasya pradarśayet | bāhuṃ darśayatedyā tu karau tasyāpi darśayet || 22
analyzed: grīvām darśayatā idyā tu bāhum tasya pradarśayet bāhum darśayatā idyā tu karau tasya api darśayet

original: netraṃ darśayatedyā tu nāsyāṃ tasyāpi darśayet | stanau ca darśayedyā tu kukṣiṃ tasyāpi darśayet || 23
analyzed: netram darśayatā id yā tu na asyām tasya api darśayet stanau ca darśayet yā tu kukṣim tasya api darśayet

original: kaṭiṃ ca darśayedyā tu guhyaṃ tasyāpi darśayet | ūruṃ ca darśayedyā tu jānuṃ tasyāpi darśayet || 24
analyzed: kaṭim ca darśayet yā tu guhyam tasya api darśayet ūrum ca darśayet yā tu jānum tasya api darśayet

original: jānu darśayate yā tu jaṅghāṃ tasyāpi darśayet | jaṅghāṃ ca darśayedyā pādau tasyāpi darśayet || 25
analyzed: jānu darśayate yā tu jaṅghām tasya api darśayet jaṅghām ca darśayet yā pādau tasya api darśayet
