original: ākāśadhāraṇā mūrdhni sarvasiddhikarī smṛtā | ekadvitricatuṣpañca udghātaiśca prasidhyati || 26
analyzed: ākāśa dhāraṇā mūrdhni sarva siddhi karī smṛtā eka dvi tri catuṣpañcaḥ udghātaiḥ ca prasidhyati

original: saṃruddhe caiva prāṇe ca mūrdhni gatvā nivartate | udghātamiti tatproktaṃ jñātavyaṃ yogibhiḥ sadā || 27
analyzed: saṃruddhe ca eva prāṇe ca mūrdhni gatvā nivartate udghātam iti tat proktam jñātavyam yogibhiḥ sadā

original: rāgadveṣau prahīyete prāṇāyāmaistu dhāritaiḥ | dhāraṇaiḥ sarvapāpāṇi pratyāhāre 'kṣasaṃyamaḥ || 28
analyzed: rāga dveṣau prahīyete prāṇāyāmaiḥ tu dhāritaiḥ dhāraṇaiḥ sarva pāpāṇi pratyāhāre kṣa saṃyamaḥ

original: hṛdgudā nābhikaṇṭhe ca sarvasandhau tathaiva ca | prāṇādyā saṃsthitā hyete rūpaṃ śabdaṃ ca me śṛṇu || 29
analyzed: hṛd gudāḥ nābhi kaṇṭhe ca sarva sandhau tathā eva ca prāṇa ādyā saṃsthitāḥ hi ete rūpam śabdam ca me śṛṇu

original: drutatāranibhaḥ †prāṇa† indragopakasannibhaḥ | kṣīrābha sphaṭikābhaśca pañcānāṃ rūpalakṣaṇam|| 30
analyzed: druta tāra nibhaḥ prāṇaḥ indragopaka sannibhaḥ kṣīra ābha sphaṭika ābhaḥ ca pañcānām rūpa lakṣaṇam

original: ghaṇṭā †nādeva† madhuro gajanādo mahādhvaniḥ | prāṇādīnāṃ ca pañcānāṃ śabdametadudāhṛtam || 31
analyzed: ghaṇṭā nādā iva madhuraḥ gaja nādaḥ mahā dhvaniḥ prāṇa ādīnām ca pañcānām śabdam etat udāhṛtam

original: bāhyamadhyātmikaṃ cārameṣāṃ ca śṛṇu sāṃpratam | prāṇameva jayetpūrvaṃ jite prāṇe jito manaḥ | jite manasi śāntātmā paraṃ tatvaṃ prakāśayet || 45
analyzed: bāhyam adhyātmikam cāram eṣām ca śṛṇu sāṃpratam prāṇam eva jayet pūrvam jite prāṇe jitaḥ manaḥ jite manasi śānta ātmā param tatvam prakāśayet

original: prāṇāpānaṃ gudāṃ dhyāyetprāṇasamāna nābhigaḥ | prāṇodānaṃ ca kaṇṭhe ca prāṇavyānañca sarvagam || 46
analyzed: prāṇa apānam dhyāyet prāṇa samāna nābhi gaḥ prāṇa udānam ca kaṇṭhe ca prāṇa vyānam ca sarvagam

original: nāgādyā prāṇasaṃyuktāḥ svasthāneṣu nirundhayet | niruddhasya ca yatkālaṃ pravakṣyāmi nibodha me || 47
analyzed: nāga ādyā prāṇa saṃyuktāḥ sva sthāneṣu nirundhayet niruddhasya ca yad kālam pravakṣyāmi nibodha me

original: tālātprabhṛti dhāryeta yāvatpañcadaśāntagaṃ | jito 'nilo bhavatyevaṃ saṃkrāntyutkrāntikarmaṇi ||48
analyzed: tālāt prabhṛti dhāryeta yāvat pañcadaśāntagam jitaḥ nilaḥ bhavati evam saṃkrānti utkrānti karmaṇi

original: divyakānti śubho gandhaḥ prajñā cāsya vivardhate | divyadṛṣṭiśca śravaṇo divyavācā pravartate ||49
analyzed: divya kānti śubhaḥ gandhaḥ prajñā ca asya vivardhate divya dṛṣṭiḥ ca śravaṇaḥ divya vācā pravartate

original: vāyuvadvicarellokāṃ siddhā devāṃśca paśyati | manecchācintitāprāptiḥ pravarteta guṇāṣṭakam || 50
analyzed: vāyu vat vicaret lokān siddhāḥ devān ca paśyati manā icchā cintita prāptiḥ pravarteta guṇa aṣṭakam
sarva sarva ca jāyate

original: prāṇāpāne tu saṃyojya hrasvakoṭisamanvitam | nābhyāṃ dhāryeta yogīndraḥ svedakampaśca jāyate || 52
analyzed: prāṇa apāne tu saṃyojya hrasva koṭi samanvitam nābhyām dhāryeta yogi indraḥ sveda kampaḥ ca jāyate

original: punarevaṃ hṛdistho hi prāṇāpāne nirundhayet | dīrghakoṭisamāyogāttatkṣaṇātpatate mahīm || 53
analyzed: punar evam hṛdisthaḥ hi prāṇa apāne nirundhayet dīrgha koṭi samāyogāt tad kṣaṇāt patate mahīm

original: kaṇṭhasthaṃ hi tathaiveha prāṇamevaṃ nirundhayet | plutakoṭisamāyogātsvapravṛttiḥ suto bhavet || 54
analyzed: kaṇṭha stham hi tathā evā iha prāṇam evam nirundhayet pluta koṭi samāyogāt sva pravṛttiḥ sutaḥ bhavet

original: bhrūmadhye binduyuktena prāṇarodhaṃ tu kārayet | suṣuptaṃ jāyate tatra kṣaṇāccaivaṃ prabudhyati || 55
analyzed: bhrū madhye bindu yuktena prāṇa rodham tu kārayet suṣuptam jāyate tatra kṣaṇāt ca evam prabudhyati

original: mūrdhni dvāraṃ samāsṛtya niṣkalaṃ dhyānamārabhet | evamabhyasatastasya pratyayastu tadā bhavet ||56
analyzed: mūrdhni dvāram samāsṛtya niṣkalam dhyānam ārabhet evam abhyasataḥ tasya pratyayaḥ tu tadā bhavet
pipīlikaṇṭaka āvedhāt mūrdhni dvāram vibhidyate

original: bhitvā krameṇa sarvāṇi unmanāntaṃ hi yāvataḥ || 57||
analyzed: bhitvā krameṇa sarvāṇi unmanā antam hi yāvataḥ
pūrva ukta lakṣaṇām devi tyaktvā svacchanda tām vrajet
jāyate tad sama tvam hi dehena anena sādhakaḥ
saṃkrāmet para deheṣu kṣudh tṛṣābhyām na bādhyate
atīta anāgatam ca eva trailokye yat pravartate
pratyakṣam tat bhavet tasya sarvajña tvam prajāyate
evam cāra gatim jñātvā śarīre sarva dehinām
gacchate ca aṣṭabhiḥ patraiḥ punar varṇa antaram vrajet

original: kādibhānte tu deveśi vikāraṃ ca prakurvati || 61 ||
analyzed: ka ādi bha ante tu deveśi vikāram ca prakurvati
sattva sthaḥ raja saṃsthaḥ ca tama sthaḥ guṇa vedakaḥ
evam paryaṭate devi sthānāt sthāna antaram vrajet
padma sūtra nibhāḥ nāḍyaḥ teṣu saṃcarate nilaḥ
aṅguṣṭhe ca eva aṅgulyaḥ tatra nāḍyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
tarjanyāḥ tatra nāḍyā kasaṃjñikā

original: aṅguṣṭhe ca khasaṃjñā ca cakāreṇa kanīyasī || 64||
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhe ca kha saṃjñā ca cakāreṇa kanīyasī
dakṣa hastasya suśroṇi trayaḥ nāḍyāḥ tu sūcitā
vāma aṅguṣṭhe ghakāra sthā hakāre madhyamā smṛtāḥ

original: akāre tu kanīyā tu vāmahastasya suvrate |
analyzed: akāre tu kanīyā tu vāma hastasya suvrate
pāda nāḍyaḥ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: ṇakāreṇa kanīyā tu nakārasthā tu madhyamāḥ |
analyzed: ṇakāreṇa kanīyā tu nakāra sthā tu madhyamāḥ
pakāre ṅguṣṭhakāḥ jñeyāḥ nāḍī trayam udāhṛtam
dakṣapādasya suśroṇi sāmpratam vāma gā tathā
kathayāmi samāsena varānane
suṣumnā guhya deśa sthā yāvat brahma vila antaram

original: gatā sā paramā nāḍī jñātavyā deśikena tu || 69 ||
analyzed: gatā sā paramā nāḍī jñātavyā deśikena tu
tatra ārūḍhaḥ ma saṃjñaḥ tu adhas ca ūrdhvam ca gacchati
tāluke ṣoḍaśa aram tu adhas vaktra vyavasthitaḥ
tatra prāptaḥ nivarteta nāsā dvāreṇa dhāvati

original: dvādaśāntaṃ tataḥ prāptaḥ puraṃ caiva viśetpunaḥ || 71 ||
analyzed: dvādaśāntam tatas prāptaḥ puram ca eva viśet punar
bindu sthāne tathā aṣṭa āram jñātavyam satatam priye
śaktisthāne ṣaṣ āram tu sūkṣma mārge vyavasthitaḥ
brahma sthāne tu saṃpūjyam devatā cakram uttamam
viṣṇu sthā yoginī ca eva dūtī rudra pada āśritāḥ
kiṅkārye īśvare devi mātaraḥ tu sadāśive

original: śaktisthā caiva deveśi viśvādyāḥ kramaśo nyaset || 74 ||
analyzed: śakti sthā ca eva deveśi viśva ādyāḥ kramaśas nyaset
prathamam devatā cakram dvitīyam yoginī smṛtam
tṛtīyam dūtikam devi kiṃkāryaḥ tu caturthakam
mātṛcakram smṛtam devi pañcamam parikīrtitam
viśveśvaryāḥ tu ṣaṣṭham syāt tava devi mayā uditam
ṣaṭcakram bhāvayet devi adhyātme parameśvari
kaulikī siddhi samprāpya yoga siddhim pravartate

original: evaṃ cāragatiṃ jñātvā sṛṣṭivedhaṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: evam cāra gatim jñātvā sṛṣṭivedham tu kārayet

original: yatra cakre tu vedho vai dīyate parameśvari || 78||
analyzed: yatra cakre tu vedhaḥ vai dīyate parameśvari
tat cakram tasya deveśi pratyakṣeṇa prapaśyati

original: tadātmakaṃ tu vijñānaṃ bhavate sādhakasya tu || 79 ||
analyzed: tad ātmakam tu vijñānam bhavate sādhakasya tu
athavā sṛṣṭi vedham tu kriyate parameśvari
yakāre vāyavī sṛṣṭi rakāre māraṇa ātmikā
lakāre stambha sṛṣṭi syāt vakāre varuṇa ātmikā
hakāre prāṇa sṛṣṭiḥ syāt sakāreṇa samanvitā
amṛta arthe samuddiṣṭā kārayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
kakāra ādi makāra antāḥ udāhṛtāḥ
etaiḥ tu sṛṣṭi vedhaḥ sti jñātvā kāma vibhāgaśaḥ
mantra sṛṣṭiḥ samuddiṣṭā tattva sṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
jīva sṛṣṭiḥ samākhyātā varṇa sṛṣṭiḥ tathā parā
bhūta sṛṣṭiḥ tathā devi yoga sṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
yat rūpam bhāvayitvā tu vedhayet parameśvari

original: tadātmakaṃ tu vijñānaṃ bhavate sādhakasya tu || 85||
analyzed: tad ātmakam tu vijñānam bhavate sādhakasya tu
sṛṣṭi rūpam bhavet sarvam jñātvā avyam sādhakena tu
dvārāṇi pañca deveśi kathayāmi samāsatas

original: hastau pādau tathā guhye pañca vedhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
analyzed: hastau pādau tathā guhye pañca vedhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
etad mārga rahitaḥ tu yaḥ vedham kartum icchati
hanate muṣṭinā ākāśam pibate mṛgatṛṣṇikām

original: nāsā karṇau ca cakṣurthyāṃ tasminvedho na vidyate || 88||
analyzed: nāsā karṇau ca tasmin vedhaḥ na vidyate
apadvārāḥ tu te proktāḥ
tena te niṣphalāḥ vedhāḥ vidveṣa uccāṭa māraṇe
iti evam sa rahasyam tu tantre smin dvidaśa ātmake
sāhasre sāram ādāya sukha bodham an ākulam
kathitam sa prapañca idam nānā vijñāna saṃkulam
yena janma sahasraiḥ tu bhaktyā ca ārādhitaḥ hi aham

original: sa prāpnoti tvidaṃ tatra anyo dṛṣṭvā tu muhyati |
analyzed: sa prāpnoti tu idam tatra anyaḥ dṛṣṭvā tu muhyati
etat tantram varam devi na ākhyātam kasyacid mayā
tava devi samākhyātam rahasyam prakaṭīkṛtam
ṛṣi deva gaṇaiḥ vandyam yoginībhiḥ prapūjitam
asmāt tantrāt param na asti rudra śakti adhiṣṭhitam
ye yoginī kule jātāḥ tad bhāva gata cetasaḥ

original: jñāyante te tvidaṃ śāstraṃ gūḍhārthaṃ jñānasāgaram |
analyzed: jñāyante te tu idam śāstram gūḍha artham jñāna sāgaram

original: likhitaṃ tiṣṭhate devi yatra tantraṃ mahāyaśe || 95 ||
analyzed: likhitam tiṣṭhate devi yatra tantram mahā yaśe
te muktim gamiṣyanti piṇḍapātāt varānane
yoginyaḥ ca eva rakṣanti putra vat pālayanti hi

original: na tasya vartate mārī nāśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit |
analyzed: na tasya vartate mārī na aśubham vidyate kvacid
yaḥ tu pūjayate śāstram amṛtam sāravat priye

original: tena yaṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ hyetaṃ kṛtaṃ samayarakṣaṇam |
analyzed: tena yaṣṭam śrutam hi etam kṛtam samaya rakṣaṇam
sva buddhyā yaḥ durātmā na pīṭha mārga vikalpakaḥ
na teṣām punarāvṛtti gatāḥ te raurava antikam
tasmāt paraṃparāyā tam mantra artham siddhi kaulikam
śrotavyam guru sāmīpye yāvantam nirmalam bhavet
gopanīyam prayatnena na śrāvyam tat abhāvitam
pramādāt śrāvayet yaḥ tu a vijñātvā tu anukramam
gacchate narakam ghoram guru drohī durātmanaḥ
na aham tasya paritrātā majjamāne bhava arṇave
yoginī gaṇa madhya sthaḥ paśuḥ eva atra sādhakaḥ
sama drohī guru drohī deva drohī varānane

original: yāṃ gatiṃ gacchate devi tāṃ gatiṃ gacchate tu saḥ || 103 ||
analyzed: yām gatim gacchate devi tām gatim gacchate tu saḥ
tasmāt prakaṭam na kartavyam yadi icchet śubham ātmanaḥ
parīkṣām yatnataḥ kṛtvā anekaiḥ tu prakārakaiḥ
abhiṣekam tatas da tvā śrāvayet dāpayet atha

original: anyathā bhavate doṣa iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ |
analyzed: anyathā bhavate doṣaḥ iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ

original: etacchāstravaraṃ devi na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit || 105 ||
analyzed: etat śāstra varam devi na deyam yasya kasyacid

original: iti bhairavasrotasi mahātantre vidyāpīṭhe saptakoṭipramāṇe śrītantrasadbhāve ātmācārādhikāro nāmāṣṭāviṃśatimaḥ paṭalaḥ
analyzed: iti bhairavasrotasi mahātantre vidyāpīṭhe sapta koṭi pramāṇe śrī tantrasadbhāve ātmācārādhikāraḥ nāma aṣṭāviṃśatimaḥ paṭalaḥ
